   19: %%
   20: -module(gen_server_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: -include_lib("kernel/include/inet.hrl").
   24: 
   25: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   26: 
   27: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   28: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   29: -export([start/1, crash/1, loop_start_fail/1, call/1, send_request/1,
   30:          send_request_receive_reqid_collection/1,
   31:          send_request_wait_reqid_collection/1,
   32:          send_request_check_reqid_collection/1,
   33:          cast/1, cast_fast/1, continue/1, info/1, abcast/1,
   34:          multicall/1, multicall_down/1, multicall_remote/1,
   35:          multicall_remote_old1/1, multicall_remote_old2/1,
   36:          multicall_recv_opt_success/1,
   37:          multicall_recv_opt_timeout/1,
   38:          multicall_recv_opt_noconnection/1,
   39: 	 call_remote1/1, call_remote2/1, call_remote3/1, calling_self/1,
   40: 	 call_remote_n1/1, call_remote_n2/1, call_remote_n3/1, spec_init/1,
   41: 	 spec_init_local_registered_parent/1, 
   42: 	 spec_init_global_registered_parent/1,
   43: 	 otp_5854/1, hibernate/1, auto_hibernate/1, otp_7669/1, call_format_status/1,
   44: 	 error_format_status/1, terminate_crash_format/1, crash_in_format_status/1,
   45:          throw_in_format_status/1, format_all_status/1,
   46: 	 get_state/1, replace_state/1, call_with_huge_message_queue/1,
   47: 	 undef_handle_call/1, undef_handle_cast/1, undef_handle_info/1,
   48: 	 undef_init/1, undef_code_change/1, undef_terminate1/1,
   49: 	 undef_terminate2/1, undef_in_terminate/1, undef_in_handle_info/1,
   50: 	 undef_handle_continue/1,
   51: 
   52:          format_log_1/1, format_log_2/1,
   53:          reply_by_alias_with_payload/1
   54: 	]).
   55: 
   56: -export([stop1/1, stop2/1, stop3/1, stop4/1, stop5/1, stop6/1, stop7/1,
   57: 	 stop8/1, stop9/1, stop10/1]).
   58: 
   59: %% spawn export
   60: -export([spec_init_local/2, spec_init_global/2, spec_init_via/2,
   61: 	 spec_init_default_timeout/2, spec_init_global_default_timeout/2,
   62:          spec_init_anonymous/1,
   63: 	 spec_init_anonymous_default_timeout/1,
   64: 	 spec_init_not_proc_lib/1, cast_fast_messup/0]).
   65: 
   66: %% Internal test specific exports
   67: -export([multicall_srv_ctrlr/2, multicall_suspender/2]).
   68: 
   69: %% The gen_server behaviour
   70: -export([init/1, handle_call/3, handle_cast/2, handle_continue/2,
   71: 	 handle_info/2, code_change/3, terminate/2, format_status/2]).
   72: 
   73: %% This module needs to compile on old nodes...
   74: -ifndef(CT_PEER).
   75: -define(CT_PEER(), {ok, undefined, undefined}).
   76: -define(CT_PEER(Opts), {ok, undefined, undefined}).
   77: -endif.
   78: -ifndef(CT_PEER_REL).
   79: -define(CT_PEER_REL(Opts, Release, PrivDir), {ok, undefined, undefined}).
   80: -endif.
   81: 
   82: suite() ->
   83:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   84:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   85: 
   86: all() -> 
   87:     [start, {group,stop}, crash, loop_start_fail, call, send_request,
   88:      send_request_receive_reqid_collection, send_request_wait_reqid_collection,
   89:      send_request_check_reqid_collection, cast, cast_fast, info, abcast,
   90:      continue,
   91:      {group, multi_call},
   92:      call_remote1, call_remote2, calling_self,
   93:      call_remote3, call_remote_n1, call_remote_n2,
   94:      call_remote_n3, spec_init,
   95:      spec_init_local_registered_parent,
   96:      spec_init_global_registered_parent, otp_5854, hibernate, auto_hibernate,
   97:      otp_7669,
   98:      {group, format_status},
   99:      get_state, replace_state,
  100:      call_with_huge_message_queue, {group, undef_callbacks},
  101:      undef_in_terminate, undef_in_handle_info,
  102:      format_log_1, format_log_2, reply_by_alias_with_payload].
  103: 
  104: groups() -> 
  105:     [{stop, [],
  106:       [stop1, stop2, stop3, stop4, stop5, stop6, stop7, stop8, stop9, stop10]},
  107:      {multi_call, [], [{group, multi_call_parallel}, {group, multi_call_sequence}]},
  108:      {multi_call_parallel, [parallel],
  109:       [multicall, multicall_down, multicall_remote, multicall_remote_old1,
  110:        multicall_remote_old2]},
  111:      {multi_call_sequence, [],
  112:       [multicall_recv_opt_success, multicall_recv_opt_timeout,
  113:        multicall_recv_opt_noconnection]},
  114:      {format_status, [],
  115:       [call_format_status, error_format_status, terminate_crash_format,
  116:        crash_in_format_status, throw_in_format_status, format_all_status]},
  117:      {undef_callbacks, [],
  118:       [undef_handle_call, undef_handle_cast, undef_handle_info, undef_handle_continue,
  119:        undef_init, undef_code_change, undef_terminate1, undef_terminate2]}].
  120: 
  121: 
  122: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  123:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  124:     Server = filename:join(DataDir, "format_status_server.erl"),
  125:     {ok, format_status_server} = compile:file(Server),
  126:     Config.
  127: 
  128: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  129:     ok.
  130: 
  131: init_per_group(undef_callbacks, Config) ->
  132:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  133:     Server = filename:join(DataDir, "oc_server.erl"),
  134:     {ok, oc_server} = compile:file(Server),
  135:     Config;
  136: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  137:     Config.
  138: 
  139: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  140:     Config.
  141: 
  142: 
  143: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) when Case == call_remote1;
  144: 				     Case == call_remote2;
  145: 				     Case == call_remote3;
  146: 				     Case == call_remote_n1;
  147: 				     Case == call_remote_n2;
  148: 				     Case == call_remote_n3;
  149:                                      Case == send_request ->
  150:     {ok,Peer,Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  151:     ok = global:sync(),
  152:     [{node,Node}, {peer, Peer} | Config];
  153: 
  154: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  155:     Config.
  156: 
  157: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  158:     case proplists:get_value(peer, Config) of
  159: 	undefined ->
  160: 	    ok;
  161: 	Peer ->
  162: 	    try peer:stop(Peer)
  163:             catch exit : noproc ->
  164:                     ok
  165:             end
  166:     end,
  167:     ok.
  168: 
  169: 
  170: %% --------------------------------------
  171: %% Start and stop a gen_server.
  172: %% --------------------------------------
  173: 
  174: start(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  175:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  176: 
  177:     %% anonymous
  178:     io:format("anonymous~n", []),
  179:     {ok, Pid0} = gen_server:start(gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  180:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid0, started_p),
  181:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid0, stop),
  182:     busy_wait_for_process(Pid0,600),
  183:     {'EXIT', {noproc,_}} = (catch gen_server:call(Pid0, started_p, 1)),
  184: 
  185:     %% anonymous with timeout
  186:     io:format("try init timeout~n", []),
  187:     {ok, Pid00} = gen_server:start(gen_server_SUITE, [],
  188: 				   [{timeout,1000}]),
  189:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid00, started_p),
  190:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid00, stop),
  191:     {error, timeout} = gen_server:start(gen_server_SUITE, sleep,
  192: 					[{timeout,100}]),
  193: 
  194:     %% anonymous with ignore
  195:     io:format("try init ignore~n", []),
  196:     ignore = gen_server:start(gen_server_SUITE, ignore, []),
  197: 
  198:     %% anonymous with shutdown
  199:     io:format("try init shutdown~n", []),
  200:     {error, foobar} =
  201:         gen_server:start(gen_server_SUITE, {error, foobar}, []),
  202: 
  203:     %% anonymous with stop
  204:     io:format("try init stop~n", []),
  205:     {error, stopped} = gen_server:start(gen_server_SUITE, stop, []),
  206: 
  207:     %% anonymous linked
  208:     {ok, Pid1} =
  209: 	gen_server:start_link(gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  210:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid1, started_p),
  211:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid1, stop),
  212:     receive
  213: 	{'EXIT', Pid1, stopped} ->
  214: 	    ok
  215:     after 5000 ->
  216: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  217:     end,
  218: 
  219:     %% anonymous monitored
  220:     {ok, {Pid1b, Mon1b}} =
  221: 	gen_server:start_monitor(gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  222:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid1b, started_p),
  223:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid1b, stop),
  224:     receive
  225: 	{'DOWN', Mon1b, process, Pid1b, stopped} ->
  226: 	    ok
  227:     after 5000 ->
  228: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  229:     end,
  230: 
  231:     %% local register
  232:     {ok, Pid2} =
  233: 	gen_server:start({local, my_test_name},
  234: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  235:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, started_p),
  236:     {error, {already_started, Pid2}} =
  237: 	gen_server:start({local, my_test_name},
  238: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  239:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, stop),
  240: 
  241:     busy_wait_for_process(Pid2,600),
  242: 
  243:     {'EXIT', {noproc,_}} = (catch gen_server:call(Pid2, started_p, 10)),
  244: 
  245:     %% local register linked
  246:     {ok, Pid3} =
  247: 	gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name},
  248: 			      gen_server_SUITE, [], []), 
  249:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, started_p),
  250:     {error, {already_started, Pid3}} =
  251: 	gen_server:start({local, my_test_name},
  252: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  253:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, stop),
  254:     receive
  255: 	{'EXIT', Pid3, stopped} ->
  256: 	    ok
  257:     after 5000 ->
  258: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  259:     end,
  260: 
  261:     %% local register monitored
  262:     {ok, {Pid3b, Mon3b}} =
  263: 	gen_server:start_monitor({local, my_test_name},
  264:                                  gen_server_SUITE, [], []), 
  265:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, started_p),
  266:     {error, {already_started, Pid3b}} =
  267: 	gen_server:start_monitor({local, my_test_name},
  268:                                  gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  269:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, stop),
  270:     receive
  271: 	{'DOWN', Mon3b, process, Pid3b, stopped} ->
  272: 	    ok
  273:     after 5000 ->
  274: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  275:     end,
  276: 
  277:     %% global register
  278:     {ok, Pid4} =
  279: 	gen_server:start({global, my_test_name},
  280: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  281:     ok = gen_server:call({global, my_test_name}, started_p),
  282:     {error, {already_started, Pid4}} =
  283: 	gen_server:start({global, my_test_name},
  284: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  285:     ok = gen_server:call({global, my_test_name}, stop),
  286:     busy_wait_for_process(Pid4,600),
  287:     {'EXIT', {noproc,_}} = (catch gen_server:call(Pid4, started_p, 10)),
  288: 
  289:     %% global register linked
  290:     {ok, Pid5} =
  291: 	gen_server:start_link({global, my_test_name},
  292: 			      gen_server_SUITE, [], []), 
  293:     ok = gen_server:call({global, my_test_name}, started_p),
  294:     {error, {already_started, Pid5}} =
  295: 	gen_server:start({global, my_test_name},
  296: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  297:     ok = gen_server:call({global, my_test_name}, stop),
  298:     receive
  299: 	{'EXIT', Pid5, stopped} ->
  300: 	    ok
  301:     after 5000 ->
  302: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  303:     end,
  304: 
  305:     %% global register monitored
  306:     {ok, {Pid5b, Mon5b}} =
  307: 	gen_server:start_monitor({global, my_test_name},
  308:                                  gen_server_SUITE, [], []), 
  309:     ok = gen_server:call({global, my_test_name}, started_p),
  310:     {error, {already_started, Pid5b}} =
  311: 	gen_server:start_monitor({global, my_test_name},
  312:                                  gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  313:     ok = gen_server:call({global, my_test_name}, stop),
  314:     receive
  315: 	{'DOWN', Mon5b, process, Pid5b, stopped} ->
  316: 	    ok
  317:     after 5000 ->
  318: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  319:     end,
  320: 
  321:     %% via register
  322:     dummy_via:reset(),
  323:     {ok, Pid6} =
  324: 	gen_server:start({via, dummy_via, my_test_name},
  325: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  326:     ok = gen_server:call({via, dummy_via, my_test_name}, started_p),
  327:     {error, {already_started, Pid6}} =
  328: 	gen_server:start({via, dummy_via, my_test_name},
  329: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  330:     ok = gen_server:call({via, dummy_via, my_test_name}, stop),
  331:     busy_wait_for_process(Pid6,600),
  332:     {'EXIT', {noproc,_}} = (catch gen_server:call(Pid6, started_p, 10)),
  333: 
  334:     %% via register linked
  335:     dummy_via:reset(),
  336:     {ok, Pid7} =
  337: 	gen_server:start_link({via, dummy_via, my_test_name},
  338: 			      gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  339:     ok = gen_server:call({via, dummy_via, my_test_name}, started_p),
  340:     {error, {already_started, Pid7}} =
  341: 	gen_server:start({via, dummy_via, my_test_name},
  342: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  343:     ok = gen_server:call({via, dummy_via, my_test_name}, stop),
  344:     receive
  345: 	{'EXIT', Pid7, stopped} ->
  346: 	    ok
  347:     after 5000 ->
  348: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  349:     end,
  350:     receive
  351: 	Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected,Msg})
  352:     after 1 -> ok
  353:     end,
  354: 
  355:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
  356:     ok.
  357: 
  358: %% Anonymous, reason 'normal'
  359: stop1(_Config) ->
  360:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server:start(?MODULE, [], []),
  361:     ok = gen_server:stop(Pid),
  362:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  363:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server:stop(Pid)),
  364:     ok.
  365: 
  366: %% Anonymous, other reason
  367: stop2(_Config) ->
  368:     {ok,Pid} = gen_server:start(?MODULE, [], []),
  369:     ok = gen_server:stop(Pid, other_reason, infinity),
  370:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  371:     ok.
  372: 
  373: %% Anonymous, invalid timeout
  374: stop3(_Config) ->
  375:     {ok,Pid} = gen_server:start(?MODULE, [], []),
  376:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch gen_server:stop(Pid, other_reason, invalid_timeout)),
  377:     true = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  378:     ok = gen_server:stop(Pid),
  379:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  380:     ok.
  381: 
  382: %% Registered name
  383: stop4(_Config) ->
  384:     {ok,Pid} = gen_server:start({local,to_stop},?MODULE, [], []),
  385:     ok = gen_server:stop(to_stop),
  386:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  387:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server:stop(to_stop)),
  388:     ok.
  389: 
  390: %% Registered name and local node
  391: stop5(_Config) ->
  392:     {ok,Pid} = gen_server:start({local,to_stop},?MODULE, [], []),
  393:     ok = gen_server:stop({to_stop,node()}),
  394:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  395:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server:stop({to_stop,node()})),
  396:     ok.
  397: 
  398: %% Globally registered name
  399: stop6(_Config) ->
  400:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server:start({global, to_stop}, ?MODULE, [], []),
  401:     ok = gen_server:stop({global,to_stop}),
  402:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  403:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server:stop({global,to_stop})),
  404:     ok.
  405: 
  406: %% 'via' registered name
  407: stop7(_Config) ->
  408:     dummy_via:reset(),
  409:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server:start({via, dummy_via, to_stop},
  410: 				 ?MODULE, [], []),
  411:     ok = gen_server:stop({via, dummy_via, to_stop}),
  412:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  413:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server:stop({via, dummy_via, to_stop})),
  414:     ok.
  415: 
  416: %% Anonymous on remote node
  417: stop8(_Config) ->
  418:     {ok,Peer,Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  419:     Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  420:     rpc:call(Node,code,add_path,[Dir]),
  421:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node,gen_server,start,[?MODULE,[],[]]),
  422:     ok = gen_server:stop(Pid),
  423:     false = rpc:call(Node,erlang,is_process_alive,[Pid]),
  424:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server:stop(Pid)),
  425:     peer:stop(Peer),
  426:     {'EXIT',{{nodedown,Node},_}} = (catch gen_server:stop(Pid)),
  427:     ok.
  428: 
  429: %% Registered name on remote node
  430: stop9(_Config) ->
  431:     {ok,Peer,Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  432:     Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  433:     rpc:call(Node,code,add_path,[Dir]),
  434:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node,gen_server,start,[{local,to_stop},?MODULE,[],[]]),
  435:     ok = gen_server:stop({to_stop,Node}),
  436:     undefined = rpc:call(Node,erlang,whereis,[to_stop]),
  437:     false = rpc:call(Node,erlang,is_process_alive,[Pid]),
  438:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server:stop({to_stop,Node})),
  439:     peer:stop(Peer),
  440:     {'EXIT',{{nodedown,Node},_}} = (catch gen_server:stop({to_stop,Node})),
  441:     ok.
  442: 
  443: %% Globally registered name on remote node
  444: stop10(_Config) ->
  445:     {ok,Peer,Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  446:     Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  447:     rpc:call(Node,code,add_path,[Dir]),
  448:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node,gen_server,start,[{global,to_stop},?MODULE,[],[]]),
  449:     ok = global:sync(),
  450:     ok = gen_server:stop({global,to_stop}),
  451:     false = rpc:call(Node,erlang,is_process_alive,[Pid]),
  452:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server:stop({global,to_stop})),
  453:     peer:stop(Peer),
  454:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server:stop({global,to_stop})),
  455:     ok.
  456: 
  457: crash(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  458:     error_logger_forwarder:register(),
  459: 
  460:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  461: 
  462:     %% This crash should not generate a crash report.
  463:     {ok,Pid0} = gen_server:start_link(?MODULE, [], []),
  464:     {'EXIT',{{shutdown,reason},_}} =
  465:  	(catch gen_server:call(Pid0, shutdown_reason)),
  466:     receive {'EXIT',Pid0,{shutdown,reason}} -> ok end,
  467: 
  468:     %% This crash should not generate a crash report.
  469:     {ok,Pid1} = gen_server:start_link(?MODULE, {state,state1}, []),
  470:     {'EXIT',{{shutdown,stop_reason},_}} =
  471: 	(catch gen_server:call(Pid1, stop_shutdown_reason)),
  472:     receive {'EXIT',Pid1,{shutdown,stop_reason}} -> ok end,
  473: 
  474:     %% This crash should not generate a crash report.
  475:     {ok,Pid2} = gen_server:start_link(?MODULE, [], []),
  476:     {'EXIT',{shutdown,_}} =
  477:  	(catch gen_server:call(Pid2, exit_shutdown)),
  478:     receive {'EXIT',Pid2,shutdown} -> ok end,
  479: 
  480:     %% This crash should not generate a crash report.
  481:     {ok,Pid3} = gen_server:start_link(?MODULE, {state,state3}, []),
  482:     {'EXIT',{shutdown,_}} =
  483: 	(catch gen_server:call(Pid3, stop_shutdown)),
  484:     receive {'EXIT',Pid3,shutdown} -> ok end,
  485: 
  486:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  487: 
  488:     %% This crash should generate a crash report and a report
  489:     %% from gen_server.
  490:     {ok,Pid4} = gen_server:start(?MODULE, {state,state4}, []),
  491:     {'EXIT',{crashed,_}} = (catch gen_server:call(Pid4, crash)),
  492:     ClientPid = self(),
  493:     receive
  494: 	{error,_GroupLeader4,{Pid4,
  495: 			      "** Generic server"++_,
  496: 			      [Pid4,crash,{formatted, state4},
  497: 			       {crashed,[{?MODULE,handle_call,3,_}
  498: 					 |_Stacktrace]},
  499: 			       ClientPid, [_|_] = _ClientStack]}} ->
  500: 	    ok;
  501: 	Other4a ->
  502: 	    io:format("Unexpected: ~p", [Other4a]),
  503: 	    ct:fail(failed)
  504:     end,
  505:     receive
  506: 	{error_report,_,{Pid4,crash_report,[List4|_]}} ->
  507: 	    {exit,crashed,[{?MODULE, handle_call, 3, _}|_]} = proplists:get_value(error_info, List4),
  508: 	    Pid4 = proplists:get_value(pid, List4);
  509: 	Other4 ->
  510: 	    io:format("Unexpected: ~p", [Other4]),
  511: 	    ct:fail(failed)
  512:     end,
  513: 
  514:     receive
  515: 	Any ->
  516: 	    io:format("Unexpected: ~p", [Any]),
  517: 	    ct:fail(failed)
  518:     after 500 ->
  519: 	    ok
  520:     end,
  521: 
  522:     ok.
  523: 
  524: 
  525: loop_start_fail(Config) ->
  526:     _ = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  527:     loop_start_fail(
  528:       Config,
  529:       [{start, []}, {start, [link]},
  530:        {start_link, []},
  531:        {start_monitor, [link]}, {start_monitor, []}]).
  532: 
  533: loop_start_fail(_Config, []) ->
  534:     ok;
  535: loop_start_fail(Config, [{Start, Opts} | Start_Opts]) ->
  536:     loop_start_fail(
  537:       fun gen_server:Start/3,
  538:       {ets, {return, {stop, failed_to_start}}}, Opts,
  539:       fun ({error, failed_to_start}) -> ok end),
  540:     loop_start_fail(
  541:       fun gen_server:Start/3,
  542:       {ets, {return, ignore}}, Opts,
  543:       fun (ignore) -> ok end),
  544:     loop_start_fail(
  545:       fun gen_server:Start/3,
  546:       {ets, {return, 4711}}, Opts,
  547:       fun ({error, {bad_return_value, 4711}}) -> ok end),
  548:     loop_start_fail(
  549:       fun gen_server:Start/3,
  550:       {ets, {crash, error, bailout}}, Opts,
  551:       fun ({error, {bailout, ST}}) when is_list(ST) -> ok end),
  552:     loop_start_fail(
  553:       fun gen_server:Start/3,
  554:       {ets, {crash, exit, bailout}}, Opts,
  555:       fun ({error, bailout}) -> ok end),
  556:     loop_start_fail(
  557:       fun gen_server:Start/3,
  558:       {ets, {wait, 1000, void}}, [{timeout, 200} | Opts],
  559:       fun ({error, timeout}) -> ok end),
  560:     loop_start_fail(Config, Start_Opts).
  561: 
  562: loop_start_fail(GenStartFun, Arg, Opts, ValidateFun) ->
  563:     loop_start_fail(GenStartFun, Arg, Opts, ValidateFun, 5).
  564: %%
  565: loop_start_fail(_GenStartFun, _Arg, _Opts, _ValidateFun, 0) ->
  566:     ok;
  567: loop_start_fail(GenStartFun, Arg, Opts, ValidateFun, N) ->
  568:     ok = ValidateFun(GenStartFun(?MODULE, Arg, Opts)),
  569:     loop_start_fail(GenStartFun, Arg, Opts, ValidateFun, N - 1).
  570: 
  571: 
  572: 
  573: %% --------------------------------------
  574: %% Test gen_server:call and handle_call.
  575: %% Test all different return values from
  576: %% handle_call.
  577: %% --------------------------------------
  578: 
  579: call(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  580:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  581: 
  582:     {ok, _Pid} =
  583: 	gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name},
  584: 			      gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  585: 
  586:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, started_p),
  587:     delayed = gen_server:call(my_test_name, {delayed_answer,1}),
  588: 
  589:     %% two requests within a specified time.
  590:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, {call_within, 1000}),
  591:     timer:sleep(500),
  592:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, next_call),
  593:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, {call_within, 1000}),
  594:     timer:sleep(1500),
  595:     false = gen_server:call(my_test_name, next_call),
  596: 
  597:     %% timeout call.
  598:     delayed = gen_server:call(my_test_name, {delayed_answer,1}, 30),
  599:     {'EXIT',{timeout,_}} =
  600: 	(catch gen_server:call(my_test_name, {delayed_answer,30}, 1)),
  601: 
  602:     %% bad return value in the gen_server loop from handle_call.
  603:     {'EXIT',{{bad_return_value, badreturn},_}} =
  604: 	(catch gen_server:call(my_test_name, badreturn)),
  605: 
  606:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
  607:     ok.
  608: 
  609: %% --------------------------------------
  610: %% Test gen_server:send_request.
  611: %% --------------------------------------
  612: 
  613: send_request(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  614:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  615: 
  616:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name},
  617:                                       gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  618: 
  619:     Async = fun(Process, Req) ->
  620:                     try
  621:                         Promise = gen_server:send_request(Process, Req),
  622:                         gen_server:wait_response(Promise, infinity)
  623:                     catch _:Reason:ST ->
  624:                             {'did_exit', Reason, ST}
  625:                     end
  626:             end,
  627:     {reply,ok} = Async(my_test_name, started_p),
  628: 
  629:     {reply,delayed} = Async(Pid, {delayed_answer,1}),
  630: 
  631:     %% two requests within a specified time.
  632:     Promise1 = gen_server:send_request(my_test_name, {call_within, 1000}),
  633:     Promise2 = gen_server:send_request(my_test_name, next_call),
  634:     {reply, ok} = gen_server:wait_response(Promise1, infinity),
  635:     {reply, ok} = gen_server:wait_response(Promise2, infinity),
  636: 
  637:     Promise3 = gen_server:send_request(my_test_name, {call_within, 1000}),
  638:     no_reply = gen_server:check_response({foo, bar}, Promise3),
  639:     receive {[alias|Ref],_} = Msg when is_reference(Ref) ->
  640:             {reply, ok} = gen_server:check_response(Msg, Promise3)
  641:     after 1000 ->
  642:             %% Format changed which is ok. This test is just to make you
  643:             %% aware that you have changed it
  644:             exit(message_format_changed)
  645:     end,
  646:     timer:sleep(1500),
  647: 
  648:     {reply, false} = Async(my_test_name, next_call),
  649: 
  650:     %% timeout
  651:     Promise5 = gen_server:send_request(my_test_name, {delayed_answer,50}),
  652:     timeout = gen_server:wait_response(Promise5, 0),
  653:     {reply, delayed} = gen_server:wait_response(Promise5, infinity),
  654: 
  655:     %% bad return value in the gen_server loop from handle_call.
  656:     {error,{{bad_return_value, badreturn},_}} = Async(my_test_name, badreturn),
  657: 
  658:     %% Test other error cases
  659:     {error, {noproc,_}} = Async(Pid, started_p),
  660:     {error, {noproc,_}} = Async(my_test_name, started_p),
  661:     {error, {noconnection, _}} = Async({my_test_name, foo@node}, started_p),
  662: 
  663:     {error, {noproc,_}} = Async({global, non_existing}, started_p),
  664:     catch exit(whereis(dummy_via), foo),
  665:     {'EXIT', {badarg,_}} =
  666:         (catch gen_server:send_request({via, dummy_via, non_existing}, started_p)),
  667: 
  668:     %% Remote nodes
  669:     Via = dummy_via:reset(),
  670:     Remote = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
  671:     {ok, RPid} = rpc:call(Remote, gen_server, start, [{global, remote}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
  672:     dummy_via:register_name(remote, RPid),
  673:     {reply, ok} = Async(RPid, started_p),
  674:     {reply, ok} = Async({global, remote}, started_p),
  675:     {reply, ok} = Async({via, dummy_via, remote}, started_p),
  676:     {error, {shutdown, _}} = Async({global, remote}, stop_shutdown),
  677:     {error, {noproc, _}} = Async({global, remote}, started_p),
  678:     {error, {noproc, _}} = Async({via, dummy_via, remote}, started_p),
  679:     {error, {noproc, _}} = Async({via, dummy_via, non_existing}, started_p),
  680: 
  681:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Remote, gen_server, start, [{local, remote}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
  682:     {reply, ok} = Async({remote, Remote}, started_p),
  683:     {error, {shutdown, _}} = Async({remote, Remote}, stop_shutdown),
  684:     {error, {noproc, _}} = Async({remote, Remote}, started_p),
  685: 
  686:     %% Cleanup
  687:     catch exit(Via, foo2),
  688:     receive {'EXIT', Via, foo2} -> ok end,
  689:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
  690:     ok.
  691: 
  692: send_request_receive_reqid_collection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  693:     {ok, Pid1} = gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name1},
  694:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  695:     {ok, Pid2} = gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name2},
  696:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  697:     {ok, Pid3} = gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name3},
  698:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  699:     send_request_receive_reqid_collection(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  700:     send_request_receive_reqid_collection_timeout(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  701:     send_request_receive_reqid_collection_error(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  702:     unlink(Pid1),
  703:     exit(Pid1, kill),
  704:     unlink(Pid2),
  705:     exit(Pid2, kill),
  706:     unlink(Pid3),
  707:     exit(Pid3, kill),
  708:     false = is_process_alive(Pid1),
  709:     false = is_process_alive(Pid2),
  710:     false = is_process_alive(Pid3),
  711:     ok.
  712: 
  713: send_request_receive_reqid_collection(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  714: 
  715:     ReqId0 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  716: 
  717:     ReqIdC0 = gen_server:reqids_new(),
  718: 
  719:     ReqId1 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,400}),
  720:     ReqIdC1 = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  721:     1 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC1),
  722: 
  723:     ReqIdC2 = gen_server:send_request(Pid2, {delayed_answer,1}, req2, ReqIdC1),
  724:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC2),
  725: 
  726:     ReqIdC3 = gen_server:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,200}, req3, ReqIdC2),
  727:     3 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
  728:     
  729:     {{reply, delayed}, req2, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqIdC3, infinity, true),
  730:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  731: 
  732:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC5} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqIdC4, 5678, true),
  733:     1 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC5),
  734: 
  735:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC6} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqIdC5, 5000, true),
  736:     0 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC6),
  737: 
  738:     no_request = gen_server:receive_response(ReqIdC6, 5000, true),
  739: 
  740:     {reply, ok} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqId0, infinity),
  741: 
  742:     ok.
  743: 
  744: send_request_receive_reqid_collection_timeout(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  745: 
  746:     ReqId0 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  747: 
  748:     ReqIdC0 = gen_server:reqids_new(),
  749: 
  750:     ReqId1 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,1000}),
  751:     ReqIdC1 = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  752: 
  753:     ReqIdC2 = gen_server:send_request(Pid2, {delayed_answer,1}, req2, ReqIdC1),
  754: 
  755:     ReqId3 = gen_server:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,500}),
  756:     ReqIdC3 = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId3, req3, ReqIdC2),
  757: 
  758:     Deadline = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond) + 100,
  759:     
  760:     {{reply, delayed}, req2, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqIdC3, {abs, Deadline}, true),
  761:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  762: 
  763:     timeout = gen_server:receive_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline}, true),
  764: 
  765:     Abandoned = lists:sort([{ReqId1, req1}, {ReqId3, req3}]),
  766:     Abandoned = lists:sort(gen_server:reqids_to_list(ReqIdC4)),
  767: 
  768:     %% Make sure requests were abandoned...
  769:     timeout = gen_server:receive_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline+1000}, true),
  770: 
  771:     {reply, ok} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqId0, infinity),
  772: 
  773:     ok.
  774:     
  775: send_request_receive_reqid_collection_error(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  776: 
  777:     ReqId0 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  778: 
  779:     ReqIdC0 = gen_server:reqids_new(),
  780: 
  781:     ReqId1 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,400}),
  782:     ReqIdC1 = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  783:     try
  784:         nope = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId1, req2, ReqIdC1)
  785:     catch
  786:         error:badarg -> ok
  787:     end,
  788:  
  789:     unlink(Pid2),
  790:     ReqIdC2 = gen_server:send_request(Pid2, stop_shutdown, req2, ReqIdC1),
  791:     ReqIdC3 = gen_server:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,200}, req3, ReqIdC2),
  792:     3 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
  793:     
  794:     {{error, {shutdown, _}}, req2, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqIdC3, 2000, true),
  795:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  796: 
  797:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqIdC4, infinity, false),
  798: 
  799:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqIdC4, infinity, false),
  800: 
  801:     {reply, ok} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqId0, infinity),
  802: 
  803:     ok.
  804: 
  805: send_request_wait_reqid_collection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  806:     {ok, Pid1} = gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name1},
  807:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  808:     {ok, Pid2} = gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name2},
  809:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  810:     {ok, Pid3} = gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name3},
  811:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  812:     send_request_wait_reqid_collection(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  813:     send_request_wait_reqid_collection_timeout(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  814:     send_request_wait_reqid_collection_error(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  815:     unlink(Pid1),
  816:     exit(Pid1, kill),
  817:     unlink(Pid2),
  818:     exit(Pid2, kill),
  819:     unlink(Pid3),
  820:     exit(Pid3, kill),
  821:     false = is_process_alive(Pid1),
  822:     false = is_process_alive(Pid2),
  823:     false = is_process_alive(Pid3),
  824:     ok.
  825: 
  826: send_request_wait_reqid_collection(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  827: 
  828:     ReqId0 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  829: 
  830:     ReqIdC0 = gen_server:reqids_new(),
  831: 
  832:     ReqId1 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,400}),
  833:     ReqIdC1 = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  834:     1 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC1),
  835: 
  836:     ReqIdC2 = gen_server:send_request(Pid2, {delayed_answer,1}, req2, ReqIdC1),
  837:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC2),
  838: 
  839:     ReqIdC3 = gen_server:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,200}, req3, ReqIdC2),
  840:     3 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
  841:     
  842:     {{reply, delayed}, req2, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC3, infinity, true),
  843:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  844: 
  845:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC5} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC4, 5678, true),
  846:     1 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC5),
  847: 
  848:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC6} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC5, 5000, true),
  849:     0 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC6),
  850: 
  851:     no_request = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC6, 5000, true),
  852: 
  853:     {reply, ok} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqId0, infinity),
  854: 
  855:     ok.
  856: 
  857: send_request_wait_reqid_collection_timeout(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  858: 
  859:     ReqId0 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  860: 
  861:     ReqIdC0 = gen_server:reqids_new(),
  862: 
  863:     ReqId1 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,1000}),
  864:     ReqIdC1 = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  865: 
  866:     ReqIdC2 = gen_server:send_request(Pid2, {delayed_answer,1}, req2, ReqIdC1),
  867: 
  868:     ReqId3 = gen_server:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,500}),
  869:     ReqIdC3 = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId3, req3, ReqIdC2),
  870: 
  871:     Deadline = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond) + 100,
  872:     
  873:     {{reply, delayed}, req2, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC3, {abs, Deadline}, true),
  874:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  875: 
  876:     timeout = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline}, true),
  877: 
  878:     Unhandled = lists:sort([{ReqId1, req1}, {ReqId3, req3}]),
  879:     Unhandled = lists:sort(gen_server:reqids_to_list(ReqIdC4)),
  880: 
  881:     %% Make sure requests were not abandoned...
  882:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline+1500}, false),
  883:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline+1500}, false),
  884: 
  885:     {reply, ok} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqId0, infinity),
  886: 
  887:     ok.
  888:     
  889: send_request_wait_reqid_collection_error(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  890: 
  891:     ReqId0 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  892: 
  893:     ReqIdC0 = gen_server:reqids_new(),
  894: 
  895:     ReqId1 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,400}),
  896:     ReqIdC1 = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  897:     try
  898:         nope = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId1, req2, ReqIdC1)
  899:     catch
  900:         error:badarg -> ok
  901:     end,
  902:  
  903:     unlink(Pid2),
  904:     ReqIdC2 = gen_server:send_request(Pid2, stop_shutdown, req2, ReqIdC1),
  905:     ReqIdC3 = gen_server:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,200}, req3, ReqIdC2),
  906:     3 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
  907:     
  908:     {{error, {shutdown, _}}, req2, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC3, 2000, true),
  909:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  910: 
  911:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC4, infinity, false),
  912: 
  913:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC4, infinity, false),
  914: 
  915:     {reply, ok} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqId0, infinity),
  916: 
  917:     ok.
  918: 
  919: send_request_check_reqid_collection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  920:     {ok, Pid1} = gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name1},
  921:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  922:     {ok, Pid2} = gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name2},
  923:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  924:     {ok, Pid3} = gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name3},
  925:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  926:     send_request_check_reqid_collection(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  927:     send_request_check_reqid_collection_error(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  928:     unlink(Pid1),
  929:     exit(Pid1, kill),
  930:     unlink(Pid2),
  931:     exit(Pid2, kill),
  932:     unlink(Pid3),
  933:     exit(Pid3, kill),
  934:     false = is_process_alive(Pid1),
  935:     false = is_process_alive(Pid2),
  936:     false = is_process_alive(Pid3),
  937:     ok.
  938: 
  939: send_request_check_reqid_collection(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  940: 
  941:     ReqId0 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  942: 
  943:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
  944: 
  945:     ReqIdC0 = gen_server:reqids_new(),
  946: 
  947:     ReqIdC1 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,400}, req1, ReqIdC0),
  948:     1 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC1),
  949: 
  950:     ReqId2 = gen_server:send_request(Pid2, {delayed_answer,1}),
  951:     ReqIdC2 = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId2, req2, ReqIdC1),
  952:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC2),
  953: 
  954:     ReqIdC3 = gen_server:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,200}, req3, ReqIdC2),
  955:     3 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
  956: 
  957:     Msg0 = next_msg(),
  958:     no_reply = gen_server:check_response(Msg0, ReqIdC3, true),
  959:     
  960:     {{reply, delayed}, req2, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC3, true),
  961:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  962: 
  963:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC5} = gen_server:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC4, true),
  964:     1 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC5),
  965: 
  966:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC6} = gen_server:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC5, true),
  967:     0 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC6),
  968: 
  969:     no_request = gen_server:check_response(Msg0, ReqIdC6, true),
  970: 
  971:     {reply, ok} = gen_server:check_response(Msg0, ReqId0),
  972: 
  973:     ok.
  974:     
  975: send_request_check_reqid_collection_error(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  976: 
  977:     ReqId0 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  978: 
  979:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
  980: 
  981:     ReqIdC0 = gen_server:reqids_new(),
  982: 
  983:     ReqId1 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,400}),
  984:     ReqIdC1 = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  985: 
  986:     unlink(Pid2),
  987:     ReqIdC2 = gen_server:send_request(Pid2, stop_shutdown, req2, ReqIdC1),
  988: 
  989:     ReqIdC3 = gen_server:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,200}, req3, ReqIdC2),
  990:     3 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
  991: 
  992:     Msg0 = next_msg(),
  993: 
  994:     no_reply = gen_server:check_response(Msg0, ReqIdC3, true),
  995:     
  996:     {{error, {shutdown, _}}, req2, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC3, true),
  997:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  998: 
  999:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC4, false),
 1000: 
 1001:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC4, false),
 1002: 
 1003:     {reply, ok} = gen_server:check_response(Msg0, ReqId0),
 1004: 
 1005:     ok.
 1006: 
 1007: next_msg() ->
 1008:     receive M -> M end.
 1009: 
 1010: %% --------------------------------------
 1011: %% Test handle_continue.
 1012: %% --------------------------------------
 1013: 
 1014: continue(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1015:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server:start_link(gen_server_SUITE, {continue, self()}, []),
 1016:     [{Pid, continue}, {Pid, after_continue}] = read_replies(Pid),
 1017: 
 1018:     gen_server:call(Pid, {continue_reply, self()}),
 1019:     [{Pid, continue}, {Pid, after_continue}] = read_replies(Pid),
 1020: 
 1021:     gen_server:call(Pid, {continue_noreply, self()}),
 1022:     [{Pid, continue}, {Pid, after_continue}] = read_replies(Pid),
 1023: 
 1024:     gen_server:cast(Pid, {continue_noreply, self()}),
 1025:     [{Pid, continue}, {Pid, after_continue}] = read_replies(Pid),
 1026: 
 1027:     Pid ! {continue_noreply, self()},
 1028:     [{Pid, continue}, {Pid, after_continue}] = read_replies(Pid),
 1029: 
 1030:     Pid ! {continue_continue, self()},
 1031:     [{Pid, before_continue}, {Pid, continue}, {Pid, after_continue}] = read_replies(Pid),
 1032: 
 1033:     Ref = monitor(process, Pid),
 1034:     Pid ! continue_stop,
 1035:     verify_down_reason(Ref, Pid, normal).
 1036: 
 1037: read_replies(Pid) ->
 1038:     receive
 1039: 	{Pid, ack} -> read_replies()
 1040:     after
 1041: 	1000 -> ct:fail({continue, ack})
 1042:     end.
 1043: 
 1044: read_replies() ->
 1045:     receive
 1046: 	Msg -> [Msg | read_replies()]
 1047:     after
 1048: 	0 -> []
 1049:     end.
 1050: 
 1051: %% --------------------------------------
 1052: %% Test call to nonexisting processes on remote nodes
 1053: %% --------------------------------------
 1054: 
 1055: call_remote1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1056:     N = hubba,
 1057:     Node = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
 1058:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node, gen_server, start,
 1059: 			 [{global, N}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
 1060:     ok = (catch gen_server:call({global, N}, started_p, infinity)),
 1061:     exit(Pid, boom),
 1062:     {'EXIT', {Reason, _}} = (catch gen_server:call({global, N},
 1063: 						   started_p, infinity)),
 1064:     true = (Reason == noproc) orelse (Reason == boom),
 1065:     ok.
 1066: 
 1067: call_remote2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1068:     N = hubba,
 1069:     Node = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
 1070: 
 1071:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node, gen_server, start,
 1072: 			 [{global, N}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
 1073:     ok = (catch gen_server:call(Pid, started_p, infinity)),
 1074:     exit(Pid, boom),
 1075:     {'EXIT', {Reason, _}} = (catch gen_server:call(Pid,
 1076: 						   started_p, infinity)),
 1077:     true = (Reason == noproc) orelse (Reason == boom),
 1078:     ok.
 1079: 
 1080: call_remote3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1081:     Node = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
 1082: 
 1083:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node, gen_server, start,
 1084: 			 [{local, piller}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
 1085:     ok = (catch gen_server:call({piller, Node}, started_p, infinity)),
 1086:     exit(Pid, boom),
 1087:     {'EXIT', {Reason, _}} = (catch gen_server:call({piller, Node},
 1088: 						   started_p, infinity)),
 1089:     true = (Reason == noproc) orelse (Reason == boom),
 1090:     ok.
 1091: 
 1092: %% --------------------------------------
 1093: %% Test call to nonexisting node
 1094: %% --------------------------------------
 1095: 
 1096: call_remote_n1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1097:     N = hubba,
 1098:     Node = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
 1099:     {ok, _Pid} = rpc:call(Node, gen_server, start,
 1100: 			  [{global, N}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
 1101:     peer:stop(proplists:get_value(peer,Config)),
 1102:     {'EXIT', {noproc, _}} =
 1103: 	(catch gen_server:call({global, N}, started_p, infinity)),
 1104: 
 1105:     ok.
 1106: 
 1107: call_remote_n2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1108:     N = hubba,
 1109:     Node = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
 1110: 
 1111:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node, gen_server, start,
 1112: 			 [{global, N}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
 1113:     peer:stop(proplists:get_value(peer,Config)),
 1114:     {'EXIT', {{nodedown, Node}, _}} = (catch gen_server:call(Pid,
 1115: 							     started_p, infinity)),
 1116: 
 1117:     ok.
 1118: 
 1119: call_remote_n3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1120:     Node = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
 1121: 
 1122:     {ok, _Pid} = rpc:call(Node, gen_server, start,
 1123: 			  [{local, piller}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
 1124:     peer:stop(proplists:get_value(peer,Config)),
 1125:     {'EXIT', {{nodedown, Node}, _}} = (catch gen_server:call({piller, Node},
 1126: 							     started_p, infinity)),
 1127: 
 1128:     ok.
 1129: 
 1130: %% --------------------------------------
 1131: %% Other bad calls
 1132: %% --------------------------------------
 1133: 
 1134: calling_self(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1135:     {'EXIT', {calling_self, _}} = (catch gen_server:call(self(), oops)),
 1136:     {'EXIT', {calling_self, _}} = (catch gen_server:call(self(), oops, infinity)),
 1137:     ok.
 1138: 
 1139: %% --------------------------------------
 1140: %% Test gen_server:cast and handle_cast.
 1141: %% Test all different return values from
 1142: %% handle_cast.
 1143: %% --------------------------------------
 1144: 
 1145: cast(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1146:     {ok, Pid} =
 1147: 	gen_server:start({local, my_test_name},
 1148: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
 1149: 
 1150:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, started_p),
 1151: 
 1152:     ok = gen_server:cast(my_test_name, {self(),handle_cast}),
 1153:     receive
 1154: 	{Pid, handled_cast} ->
 1155: 	    ok
 1156:     after 1000 ->
 1157: 	    ct:fail(handle_cast)
 1158:     end,
 1159: 
 1160:     ok = gen_server:cast(my_test_name, {self(),delayed_cast,1}),
 1161:     receive
 1162: 	{Pid, delayed} ->
 1163: 	    ok
 1164:     after 1000 ->
 1165: 	    ct:fail(delayed_cast)
 1166:     end,
 1167: 
 1168:     ok = gen_server:cast(my_test_name, {self(),stop}),
 1169:     receive
 1170: 	{Pid, stopped} ->
 1171: 	    ok
 1172:     after 1000 ->
 1173: 	    ct:fail(stop)
 1174:     end,
 1175:     ok.
 1176: 
 1177: %% Test that cast really return immediately.
 1178: cast_fast(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1179:     {ok,Peer,Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1180:     %% After starting a slave, it takes a little while until global knows
 1181:     %% about it, even if nodes() includes it, so we make sure that global
 1182:     %% knows about it before registering something on all nodes.
 1183:     ok = global:sync(),
 1184:     {_,"@"++Host} = lists:splitwith(fun ($@) -> false; (_) -> true end,
 1185: 				    atom_to_list(Node)),
 1186:     FalseNode = list_to_atom("hopp@"++Host),
 1187:     true = rpc:cast(Node, ?MODULE, cast_fast_messup, []),
 1188:     ct:sleep(1000),
 1189:     [Node] = nodes(),
 1190:     {Time,ok} = timer:tc(fun() ->
 1191: 				 gen_server:cast({hopp,FalseNode}, hopp)
 1192: 			 end),
 1193:     peer:stop(Peer),
 1194:     if Time > 1000000 ->       % Default listen timeout is about 7.0 s
 1195: 	    ct:fail(hanging_cast);
 1196:        true ->
 1197: 	    ok
 1198:     end.
 1199: 
 1200: cast_fast_messup() ->
 1201:     %% Register a false node: hopp@hostname
 1202:     unregister(erl_epmd),
 1203:     {ok, _} = erl_epmd:start_link(),
 1204:     {ok,S} = gen_tcp:listen(0, []),
 1205:     {ok,P} = inet:port(S),
 1206:     {ok,_Creation} = erl_epmd:register_node(hopp, P),
 1207:     receive after infinity -> ok end.
 1208: 
 1209: %% --------------------------------------
 1210: %% Test handle_info.
 1211: %% --------------------------------------
 1212: 
 1213: info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1214:     {ok, Pid} =
 1215: 	gen_server:start({local, my_test_name},
 1216: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
 1217: 
 1218:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, started_p),
 1219: 
 1220:     Pid ! {self(),handle_info},
 1221:     receive
 1222: 	{Pid, handled_info} ->
 1223: 	    ok
 1224:     after 1000 ->
 1225: 	    ct:fail(handle_info)
 1226:     end,
 1227: 
 1228:     Pid ! {self(),delayed_info,1},
 1229:     receive
 1230: 	{Pid, delayed_info} ->
 1231: 	    ok
 1232:     after 1000 ->
 1233: 	    ct:fail(delayed_info)
 1234:     end,
 1235: 
 1236:     Pid ! {self(),stop},
 1237:     receive
 1238: 	{Pid, stopped_info} ->
 1239: 	    ok
 1240:     after 1000 ->
 1241: 	    ct:fail(stop_info)
 1242:     end,
 1243:     ok.
 1244: 
 1245: hibernate(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1246:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1247:     {ok, Pid0} =
 1248: 	gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name_hibernate0},
 1249: 			      gen_server_SUITE, hibernate, []),
 1250:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid0),
 1251:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate0, stop),
 1252:     receive 
 1253: 	{'EXIT', Pid0, stopped} ->
 1254:  	    ok
 1255:     after 5000 ->
 1256: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1257:     end,
 1258: 
 1259:     {ok, Pid} =
 1260: 	gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name_hibernate},
 1261: 			      gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
 1262: 
 1263:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate, started_p),
 1264:     true = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate, hibernate),
 1265:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1266:     Parent = self(),
 1267:     Fun = fun() ->
 1268: 		  receive go -> ok end,
 1269: 		  receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 1270: 		  X = erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function),
 1271:  		  Pid ! continue,
 1272:  		  Parent ! {result,X}
 1273:  	  end,
 1274:     Pid2 = spawn_link(Fun),
 1275:     true = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate, {hibernate_noreply,Pid2}),
 1276: 
 1277:     gen_server:cast(my_test_name_hibernate, hibernate_later),
 1278:     true = ({current_function,{erlang,hibernate,3}} =/=
 1279: 		erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function)),
 1280:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1281:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate, started_p),
 1282:     true = ({current_function,{erlang,hibernate,3}} =/=
 1283: 		erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function)),
 1284: 
 1285:     gen_server:cast(my_test_name_hibernate, hibernate_now),
 1286:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1287:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate, started_p),
 1288:     true = ({current_function,{erlang,hibernate,3}} =/=
 1289: 		erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function)),
 1290: 
 1291:     Pid ! hibernate_later,
 1292:     true = ({current_function,{erlang,hibernate,3}} =/=
 1293: 		erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function)),
 1294:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1295:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate, started_p),
 1296:     true = ({current_function,{erlang,hibernate,3}} =/=
 1297: 		erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function)),
 1298: 
 1299:     Pid ! hibernate_now,
 1300:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1301:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate, started_p),
 1302:     true = ({current_function,{erlang,hibernate,3}} =/=
 1303: 		erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function)),
 1304:     receive
 1305: 	{result,R} ->
 1306: 	    {current_function,{erlang,hibernate,3}} = R
 1307:     end,
 1308: 
 1309:     true = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate, hibernate),
 1310:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1311:     sys:suspend(my_test_name_hibernate),
 1312:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1313:     sys:resume(my_test_name_hibernate),
 1314:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1315:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate, started_p),
 1316:     true = ({current_function,{erlang,hibernate,3}} =/= erlang:process_info(Pid,current_function)),
 1317: 
 1318:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate, stop),
 1319:     receive 
 1320: 	{'EXIT', Pid, stopped} ->
 1321:  	    ok
 1322:     after 5000 ->
 1323: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1324:     end,
 1325:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
 1326:     ok.
 1327: 
 1328: auto_hibernate(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1329:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1330:     HibernateAfterTimeout = 100,
 1331:     State = {auto_hibernate_state},
 1332:     {ok, Pid} =
 1333:         gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name_auto_hibernate},
 1334:             gen_server_SUITE, {state,State}, [{hibernate_after, HibernateAfterTimeout}]),
 1335:     %% After init test
 1336:     is_not_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1337:     timer:sleep(HibernateAfterTimeout),
 1338:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1339:     %% Get state test
 1340:     State = sys:get_state(my_test_name_auto_hibernate),
 1341:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1342:     %% Call test
 1343:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name_auto_hibernate, started_p),
 1344:     is_not_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1345:     timer:sleep(HibernateAfterTimeout),
 1346:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1347:     %% Cast test
 1348:     ok = gen_server:cast(my_test_name_auto_hibernate, {self(),handle_cast}),
 1349:     receive
 1350:         {Pid, handled_cast} ->
 1351:             ok
 1352:     after 1000 ->
 1353:         ct:fail(cast)
 1354:     end,
 1355:     is_not_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1356:     timer:sleep(HibernateAfterTimeout),
 1357:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1358:     %% Info test
 1359:     Pid ! {self(),handle_info},
 1360:     receive
 1361:         {Pid, handled_info} ->
 1362:             ok
 1363:     after 1000 ->
 1364:         ct:fail(info)
 1365:     end,
 1366:     is_not_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1367:     timer:sleep(HibernateAfterTimeout),
 1368:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1369: 
 1370:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name_auto_hibernate, stop),
 1371:     receive
 1372:         {'EXIT', Pid, stopped} ->
 1373:             ok
 1374:     after 5000 ->
 1375:         ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1376:     end,
 1377:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
 1378:     ok.
 1379: 
 1380: is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid) ->
 1381:     receive after 1 -> ok end,
 1382:     is_in_erlang_hibernate_1(200, Pid).
 1383: 
 1384: is_in_erlang_hibernate_1(0, Pid) ->
 1385:     io:format("~p\n", [erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function)]),
 1386:     ct:fail(not_in_erlang_hibernate_3);
 1387: is_in_erlang_hibernate_1(N, Pid) ->
 1388:     {current_function,MFA} = erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function),
 1389:     case MFA of
 1390: 	{erlang,hibernate,3} ->
 1391: 	    ok;
 1392: 	_ ->
 1393: 	    receive after 10 -> ok end,
 1394: 	    is_in_erlang_hibernate_1(N-1, Pid)
 1395:     end.
 1396: 
 1397: is_not_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid) ->
 1398:     receive after 1 -> ok end,
 1399:     is_not_in_erlang_hibernate_1(200, Pid).
 1400: 
 1401: is_not_in_erlang_hibernate_1(0, Pid) ->
 1402:     io:format("~p\n", [erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function)]),
 1403:     ct:fail(not_in_erlang_hibernate_3);
 1404: is_not_in_erlang_hibernate_1(N, Pid) ->
 1405:     {current_function,MFA} = erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function),
 1406:     case MFA of
 1407:         {erlang,hibernate,3} ->
 1408:             receive after 10 -> ok end,
 1409:             is_not_in_erlang_hibernate_1(N-1, Pid);
 1410:         _ ->
 1411:             ok
 1412:     end.
 1413: 
 1414: %% --------------------------------------
 1415: %% Test gen_server:abcast and handle_cast.
 1416: %% Test all different return values from
 1417: %% handle_cast.
 1418: %% --------------------------------------
 1419: 
 1420: abcast(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1421:     {ok, Pid} =
 1422: 	gen_server:start({local, my_test_name},
 1423: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
 1424: 
 1425:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, started_p),
 1426: 
 1427:     abcast = gen_server:abcast(my_test_name, {self(),handle_cast}),
 1428:     receive
 1429: 	{Pid, handled_cast} ->
 1430: 	    ok
 1431:     after 1000 ->
 1432: 	    ct:fail(abcast)
 1433:     end,
 1434: 
 1435:     abcast = gen_server:abcast([node()], my_test_name,
 1436: 			       {self(),delayed_cast,1}),
 1437:     receive
 1438: 	{Pid, delayed} ->
 1439: 	    ok
 1440:     after 1000 ->
 1441: 	    ct:fail(delayed_abcast)
 1442:     end,
 1443: 
 1444:     abcast = gen_server:abcast(my_test_name, {self(),stop}),
 1445:     receive
 1446: 	{Pid, stopped} ->
 1447: 	    ok
 1448:     after 1000 ->
 1449: 	    ct:fail(abcast_stop)
 1450:     end,
 1451:     ok.
 1452: 
 1453: %% --------------------------------------
 1454: %% Test gen_server:multicall and handle_call.
 1455: %% Test all different return values from
 1456: %% handle_call.
 1457: %% --------------------------------------
 1458: 
 1459: multicall(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1460:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1461: 
 1462:     {ok, Pid} =
 1463: 	gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name},
 1464: 			      gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
 1465: 
 1466:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, started_p),
 1467:     Nodes = nodes(),
 1468:     Node = node(),
 1469:     {[{Node,delayed}],Nodes} =
 1470: 	gen_server:multi_call(my_test_name, {delayed_answer,1}),
 1471: 
 1472:     %% two requests within a specified time.
 1473:     {[{Node,ok}],[]} =
 1474: 	gen_server:multi_call([Node], my_test_name, {call_within, 1000}),
 1475:     timer:sleep(500),
 1476:     {[{Node,ok}],[]} =
 1477: 	gen_server:multi_call([Node], my_test_name, next_call),
 1478:     {[{Node,ok}],[]} =
 1479: 	gen_server:multi_call([Node], my_test_name, {call_within, 1000}),
 1480:     timer:sleep(1500),
 1481:     {[{Node,false}],[]} =
 1482: 	gen_server:multi_call([Node],my_test_name, next_call),
 1483: 
 1484:     %% Stop the server.
 1485:     {[{Node,ok}],[]} =
 1486: 	gen_server:multi_call([Node],my_test_name, stop),
 1487:     receive
 1488: 	{'EXIT', Pid, stopped} -> ok
 1489:     after 1000 ->
 1490: 	    ct:fail(multicall_stop)
 1491:     end,
 1492: 
 1493:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
 1494: 
 1495:     ok.
 1496: 
 1497: %% OTP-3587
 1498: multicall_down(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1499:     %% We need a named host which is inaccessible.
 1500:     Name = node@test01,
 1501: 
 1502:     %% We use 'global' as a gen_server to call.
 1503:     {Good, Bad} = gen_server:multi_call([Name, node()],
 1504: 					global_name_server,
 1505: 					info,
 1506: 					3000),
 1507:     io:format("good = ~p, bad = ~p~n", [Good, Bad]),
 1508:     [Name] = Bad,
 1509:     ok.
 1510: 
 1511: busy_wait_for_process(Pid,N) ->
 1512:     case erlang:is_process_alive(Pid) of
 1513: 	true ->
 1514: 	    receive
 1515: 	    after 100 ->
 1516: 		    ok
 1517: 	    end,
 1518: 	    busy_wait_for_process(Pid,N-1);
 1519: 	_ ->
 1520: 	    ok
 1521:     end.
 1522: 
 1523: multicall_remote(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1524:     PNs = lists:map(fun (_) ->
 1525:                             {ok, P, N} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1526:                             {P, N}
 1527:                     end, lists:seq(1, 4)),
 1528:     multicall_remote_test(PNs, ?FUNCTION_NAME),
 1529:     ok.
 1530: 
 1531: multicall_remote_old1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1532:     multicall_remote_old_test(Config, 1, ?FUNCTION_NAME).
 1533: 
 1534: multicall_remote_old2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1535:     multicall_remote_old_test(Config, 2, ?FUNCTION_NAME).
 1536: 
 1537: 
 1538: multicall_remote_old_test(Config, OldN, Name) ->
 1539:     try
 1540:         {OldRelName, OldRel} = old_release(OldN),
 1541:         PD = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1542:         PNs = lists:map(fun (I) ->
 1543:                                 Dir = atom_to_list(Name)++"-"++integer_to_list(I),
 1544:                                 AbsDir = filename:join([PD, Dir]),
 1545:                                 ok = file:make_dir(AbsDir),
 1546:                                 case ?CT_PEER_REL(#{connection => 0}, OldRelName, AbsDir) of
 1547:                                     not_available ->
 1548:                                         throw({skipped, "No OTP "++OldRel++" available"});
 1549:                                     {ok, P, N} ->
 1550:                                         {P, N}
 1551:                                 end
 1552:                         end, lists:seq(1, 4)),
 1553:         OldNodes = lists:map(fun ({_, N}) -> N end, PNs),
 1554:         %% Recompile on one old node and load this on all old nodes...
 1555:         SrcFile = filename:rootname(code:which(?MODULE)) ++ ".erl",
 1556:         {ok, ?MODULE, BeamCode} = erpc:call(hd(OldNodes), compile, file, [SrcFile, [binary]]),
 1557:         LoadResult = lists:duplicate(length(OldNodes), {ok, {module, ?MODULE}}),
 1558:         LoadResult = erpc:multicall(OldNodes, code, load_binary, [?MODULE, SrcFile, BeamCode]),
 1559:         multicall_remote_test(PNs, Name)
 1560:     catch
 1561:         throw:Res ->
 1562:             Res
 1563:     end.
 1564: 
 1565: multicall_remote_test([{Peer1, Node1},
 1566:                        {Peer2, Node2},
 1567:                        {Peer3, Node3},
 1568:                        {Peer4, Node4}],
 1569:                       Name) ->
 1570:     Tester = self(),
 1571:     ThisNode = node(),
 1572: 
 1573:     Nodes = [Node1, Node2, Node3, Node4, ThisNode],
 1574: 
 1575:     SrvList =
 1576:         lists:map(fun (Node) ->
 1577:                           Ctrl = spawn_link(Node, ?MODULE,
 1578:                                             multicall_srv_ctrlr,
 1579:                                             [Tester, Name]),
 1580:                           receive
 1581:                               {Ctrl, _Srv} = Procs ->
 1582:                                   {Node, Procs}
 1583:                           end
 1584:                   end, Nodes),
 1585:     SrvMap = maps:from_list(SrvList),
 1586: 
 1587:     Res0 = {lists:map(fun (Node) ->
 1588:                               {Node,ok}
 1589:                       end, Nodes), []},
 1590: 
 1591:     Res0 = gen_server:multi_call(Nodes, Name, started_p),
 1592: 
 1593:     true = try
 1594:                _ = gen_server:multi_call([Node1, Node2, Node3, node(), {Node4}],
 1595:                                          Name, {delayed_answer,1}),
 1596:                false
 1597:            catch
 1598:                _:_ ->
 1599:                    true
 1600:            end,
 1601: 
 1602:     Res1 = {lists:map(fun (Node) ->
 1603:                               {Node,delayed}
 1604:                       end, Nodes), []},
 1605: 
 1606:     Res1 = gen_server:multi_call(Nodes, Name, {delayed_answer,1}),
 1607: 
 1608:     Res2 = {[], Nodes},
 1609: 
 1610:     Start = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond),
 1611:     Res2 = gen_server:multi_call(Nodes, Name, {delayed_answer,1000}, 100),
 1612:     End = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond),
 1613:     Time = End-Start,
 1614:     ct:log("Time: ~p ms~n", [Time]),
 1615:     true = 200 >= Time,
 1616: 
 1617:     {Ctrl2, Srv2} = maps:get(Node2, SrvMap),
 1618:     unlink(Ctrl2),
 1619:     exit(Ctrl2, kill),
 1620:     wait_until(fun () ->
 1621:                        false == erpc:call(Node2, erlang,
 1622:                                           is_process_alive, [Srv2])
 1623:                end),
 1624: 
 1625:     {Ctrl3, _Srv3} = maps:get(Node3, SrvMap),
 1626:     unlink(Ctrl3),
 1627:     peer:stop(Peer3),
 1628: 
 1629:     {Ctrl4, Srv4} = maps:get(Node4, SrvMap),
 1630:     Spndr = spawn_link(Node4, ?MODULE, multicall_suspender, [Tester, Srv4]),
 1631: 
 1632:     Res3 = {[{Node1, delayed}, {ThisNode, delayed}],
 1633:             [Node2, Node3, Node4]},
 1634: 
 1635:     Res3 = gen_server:multi_call(Nodes, Name, {delayed_answer,1}, 1000),
 1636: 
 1637:     Spndr ! {Tester, resume_it},
 1638: 
 1639:     receive Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected_msg, Msg})
 1640:     after 1000 -> ok
 1641:     end,
 1642: 
 1643:     unlink(Ctrl4),
 1644: 
 1645:     {Ctrl1, _Srv1} = maps:get(Node1, SrvMap),
 1646: 
 1647:     unlink(Ctrl1),
 1648: 
 1649:     peer:stop(Peer1),
 1650:     peer:stop(Peer2),
 1651:     peer:stop(Peer4),
 1652: 
 1653:     ok.
 1654: 
 1655: multicall_srv_ctrlr(Tester, Name) ->
 1656:     {ok, Srv} = gen_server:start_link({local, Name},
 1657:                                       gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
 1658:     Tester ! {self(), Srv},
 1659:     receive after infinity -> ok end.
 1660: 
 1661: multicall_suspender(Tester, Suspendee) ->
 1662:     true = erlang:suspend_process(Suspendee),
 1663:     receive
 1664:         {Tester, resume_it} ->
 1665:             erlang:resume_process(Suspendee)
 1666:     end.
 1667: 
 1668: multicall_recv_opt_success(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1669:     multicall_recv_opt_test(success).
 1670: 
 1671: multicall_recv_opt_timeout(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1672:     multicall_recv_opt_test(timeout).
 1673: 
 1674: multicall_recv_opt_noconnection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1675:     multicall_recv_opt_test(noconnection).
 1676: 
 1677: multicall_recv_opt_test(Type) ->
 1678:     Tester = self(),
 1679:     Name = ?FUNCTION_NAME,
 1680:     Loops = 1000,
 1681:     HugeMsgQ = 500000,
 1682:     process_flag(message_queue_data, off_heap),
 1683: 
 1684:     {ok, Peer1, Node1} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1685:     {ok, Peer2, Node2} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1686: 
 1687:     if Type == noconnection -> peer:stop(Peer2);
 1688:        true -> ok
 1689:     end,
 1690: 
 1691:     Nodes = [Node1, Node2],
 1692: 
 1693:     SrvList =
 1694:         lists:map(fun (Node) ->
 1695:                           Ctrl = spawn_link(Node, ?MODULE,
 1696:                                             multicall_srv_ctrlr,
 1697:                                             [Tester, Name]),
 1698:                           receive
 1699:                               {Ctrl, _Srv} = Procs ->
 1700:                                   {Node, Procs}
 1701:                           end
 1702:                   end,
 1703:                   if Type == noconnection -> [Node1];
 1704:                      true -> Nodes
 1705:                   end),
 1706: 
 1707:     {Req, ExpRes, Tmo} = case Type of
 1708:                              success ->
 1709:                                  {ping,
 1710:                                   {[{Node1, pong}, {Node2, pong}], []},
 1711:                                   infinity};
 1712:                              timeout ->
 1713:                                  {{delayed_answer,100},
 1714:                                   {[], Nodes},
 1715:                                   1};
 1716:                              noconnection ->
 1717:                                  {ping,
 1718:                                   {[{Node1, pong}], [Node2]},
 1719:                                   infinity}
 1720:                          end,
 1721: 
 1722:     _Warmup = time_multicall(ExpRes, Nodes, Name, Req, Tmo, Loops div 10),
 1723: 
 1724:     Empty = time_multicall(ExpRes, Nodes, Name, Req, Tmo, Loops),
 1725:     ct:pal("Time with empty message queue: ~p microsecond~n",
 1726:            [erlang:convert_time_unit(Empty, native, microsecond)]),
 1727: 
 1728:     make_msgq(HugeMsgQ),
 1729: 
 1730:     Huge = time_multicall(ExpRes, Nodes, Name, Req, Tmo, Loops),
 1731:     ct:pal("Time with huge message queue: ~p microsecond~n",
 1732:            [erlang:convert_time_unit(Huge, native, microsecond)]),
 1733: 
 1734:     lists:foreach(fun ({_Node, {Ctrl, _Srv}}) -> unlink(Ctrl) end, SrvList),
 1735: 
 1736:     peer:stop(Peer1),
 1737:     if Type == noconnection -> ok;
 1738:        true -> peer:stop(Peer2)
 1739:     end,
 1740: 
 1741:     Q = Huge / Empty,
 1742:     HugeMsgQ = flush_msgq(),
 1743:     case Q > 10 of
 1744: 	true ->
 1745: 	    ct:fail({ratio, Q});
 1746: 	false ->
 1747: 	    {comment, "Ratio: "++erlang:float_to_list(Q)}
 1748:     end.
 1749: 
 1750: time_multicall(Expect, Nodes, Name, Req, Tmo, Times) ->
 1751:     Start = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 1752:     ok = do_time_multicall(Expect, Nodes, Name, Req, Tmo, Times),
 1753:     erlang:monotonic_time() - Start.
 1754: 
 1755: do_time_multicall(_Expect, _Nodes, _Name, _Req, _Tmo, 0) ->
 1756:     ok;
 1757: do_time_multicall(Expect, Nodes, Name, Req, Tmo, N) ->
 1758:     Expect = gen_server:multi_call(Nodes, Name, Req, Tmo),
 1759:     do_time_multicall(Expect, Nodes, Name, Req, Tmo, N-1).
 1760: 
 1761: make_msgq(0) ->
 1762:     ok;
 1763: make_msgq(N) ->
 1764:     self() ! {a, msg},
 1765:     make_msgq(N-1).
 1766: 
 1767: %%--------------------------------------------------------------
 1768: %% Test gen_server:enter_loop/[3,4,5]. Used when you want to write
 1769: %% your own special init-phase.
 1770: spec_init(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1771: 
 1772:     OldFlag = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1773: 
 1774:     {ok, Pid0} = start_link(spec_init_local, [{ok, my_server}, []]),
 1775:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid0, started_p),
 1776:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid0, stop),
 1777:     receive 
 1778: 	{'EXIT', Pid0, stopped} ->
 1779:  	    ok
 1780:     after 5000 ->
 1781: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1782:     end,
 1783: 
 1784:     {ok, Pid01} = start_link(spec_init_local, [{not_ok, my_server}, []]),
 1785:     receive 
 1786:  	{'EXIT', Pid01, process_not_registered} ->
 1787:  	    ok
 1788:     after 5000 ->
 1789: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1790:     end,
 1791: 
 1792:     {ok, Pid1} = start_link(spec_init_global, [{ok, my_server}, []]),
 1793:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid1, started_p),
 1794:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid1, stop),
 1795:     receive 
 1796: 	{'EXIT', Pid1, stopped} ->
 1797:  	    ok
 1798:     after 5000 ->
 1799: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1800:     end,
 1801: 
 1802:     {ok, Pid11} =
 1803: 	start_link(spec_init_global, [{not_ok, my_server}, []]),
 1804: 
 1805:     receive 
 1806: 	{'EXIT', Pid11, process_not_registered_globally} ->
 1807:  	    ok
 1808:     after 5000 ->
 1809: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1810:     end,
 1811: 
 1812:     {ok, Pid2} = start_link(spec_init_anonymous, [[]]),
 1813:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid2, started_p),
 1814:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid2, stop),
 1815:     receive 
 1816: 	{'EXIT', Pid2, stopped} ->
 1817:  	    ok
 1818:     after 5000 ->
 1819: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1820:     end,
 1821: 
 1822:     {ok, Pid3} = start_link(spec_init_anonymous_default_timeout, [[]]),
 1823:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid3, started_p),
 1824:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid3, stop),
 1825:     receive 
 1826: 	{'EXIT', Pid3, stopped} ->
 1827:  	    ok
 1828:     after 5000 ->
 1829: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1830:     end,
 1831: 
 1832:     {ok, Pid4} =
 1833: 	start_link(spec_init_default_timeout, [{ok, my_server}, []]),
 1834:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid4, started_p),
 1835:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid4, stop),
 1836:     receive 
 1837: 	{'EXIT', Pid4, stopped} ->
 1838:  	    ok
 1839:     after 5000 ->
 1840: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1841:     end,
 1842: 
 1843:     %% Before the OTP-10130 fix this failed because a timeout message
 1844:     %% was generated as the spawned process crashed because a {global, Name}
 1845:     %% was matched as a timeout value instead of matching on scope.
 1846:     {ok, _PidHurra} =
 1847: 	start_link(spec_init_global_default_timeout, [{ok, hurra}, []]),
 1848:     timer:sleep(1000),
 1849:     ok = gen_server:call(_PidHurra, started_p),
 1850: 
 1851:     Pid5 =
 1852: 	erlang:spawn_link(?MODULE, spec_init_not_proc_lib, [[]]),
 1853:     receive 
 1854: 	{'EXIT', Pid5, process_was_not_started_by_proc_lib} ->
 1855:  	    ok
 1856:     after 5000 ->
 1857: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1858:     end,
 1859:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFlag),
 1860:     ok.
 1861: 
 1862: %%--------------------------------------------------------------
 1863: %% OTP-4820. Test that terminate is run when the parent is a locally
 1864: %% registered process.
 1865: spec_init_local_registered_parent(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1866: 
 1867:     register(foobar, self()),
 1868:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1869: 
 1870:     {ok, Pid} = start_link(spec_init_local, [{ok, my_server}, []]),
 1871: 
 1872:     ok = gen_server:cast(my_server, {self(),stop}),
 1873:     receive
 1874: 	{Pid, stopped} ->
 1875: 	    ok
 1876:     after 1000 ->
 1877: 	    ct:fail(stop)
 1878:     end,
 1879:     unregister(foobar),
 1880:     ok.
 1881: 
 1882: %%--------------------------------------------------------------
 1883: %% OTP-4820. Test that terminate is run when the parent is a global registered
 1884: %% process.
 1885: spec_init_global_registered_parent(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1886: 
 1887:     global:register_name(foobar, self()),
 1888:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1889: 
 1890:     {ok, Pid} = start_link(spec_init_global, [{ok, my_server}, []]),
 1891: 
 1892:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid, started_p),
 1893:     ok = gen_server:cast(Pid, {self(),stop}),
 1894: 
 1895:     receive
 1896: 	{Pid, stopped} ->
 1897: 	    ok
 1898:     after 1000 ->
 1899: 	    ct:fail(stop)
 1900:     end,
 1901:     global:unregister_name(foobar),
 1902:     ok.
