 1905: 
 1906: %% Test check for registered name in enter_loop/3,4,5.
 1907: otp_5854(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1908:     OldFlag = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1909: 
 1910:     dummy_via:reset(),
 1911: 
 1912:     %% Make sure gen_server:enter_loop does not accept {local,Name}
 1913:     %% when it's another process than the calling one which is
 1914:     %% registered under that name
 1915:     register(armitage, self()),
 1916:     {ok, Pid1} =
 1917: 	start_link(spec_init_local, [{not_ok, armitage}, []]),
 1918:     receive
 1919: 	{'EXIT', Pid1, process_not_registered} ->
 1920: 	    ok
 1921:     after 1000 ->
 1922: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_started)
 1923:     end,
 1924:     unregister(armitage),
 1925: 
 1926:     %% Make sure gen_server:enter_loop does not accept {global,Name}
 1927:     %% when it's another process than the calling one which is
 1928:     %% registered under that name
 1929:     global:register_name(armitage, self()),
 1930:     {ok, Pid2} =
 1931: 	start_link(spec_init_global, [{not_ok, armitage}, []]),
 1932:     receive
 1933: 	{'EXIT', Pid2, process_not_registered_globally} ->
 1934: 	    ok
 1935:     after 1000 ->
 1936: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_started)
 1937:     end,
 1938:     global:unregister_name(armitage),
 1939: 
 1940:     %% (same for {via, Mod, Name})
 1941:     dummy_via:register_name(armitage, self()),
 1942:     {ok, Pid3} =
 1943: 	start_link(spec_init_via, [{not_ok, armitage}, []]),
 1944:     receive
 1945: 	{'EXIT', Pid3, {process_not_registered_via, dummy_via}} ->
 1946: 	    ok
 1947:     after 1000 ->
 1948: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_started)
 1949:     end,
 1950:     dummy_via:unregister_name(armitage),
 1951: 
 1952:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFlag),
 1953:     ok.
 1954: 
 1955: %% If initialization fails (with ignore or {stop,Reason}),
 1956: %% make sure that the process is not registered when gen_server:start()
 1957: %% returns.
 1958: 
 1959: otp_7669(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1960:     do_times(100, fun do_otp_7669_local_ignore/0),
 1961:     do_times(100, fun do_otp_7669_global_ignore/0),
 1962:     do_times(10, fun do_otp_7669_stop/0),
 1963:     ok.    
 1964: 
 1965: do_times(0, _) ->
 1966:     ok;
 1967: do_times(N, Fun) ->
 1968:     Fun(),
 1969:     do_times(N-1, Fun).
 1970: 
 1971: do_otp_7669_local_ignore() ->
 1972:     %% The name should never be registered after the return
 1973:     %% from gen_server:start/3.
 1974:     ignore = gen_server:start({local,?MODULE}, ?MODULE, ignore, []),
 1975:     undefined = whereis(?MODULE),
 1976:     ignore = gen_server:start({local,?MODULE}, ?MODULE, ignore, []),
 1977:     undefined = whereis(?MODULE),
 1978:     ignore = gen_server:start_link({local,?MODULE}, ?MODULE, ignore, []),
 1979:     undefined = whereis(?MODULE).
 1980: 
 1981: do_otp_7669_global_ignore() ->
 1982:     ignore = gen_server:start({global,?MODULE}, ?MODULE, ignore, []),
 1983:     undefined = global:whereis_name(?MODULE),
 1984:     ignore = gen_server:start_link({global,?MODULE}, ?MODULE, ignore, []),
 1985:     undefined = global:whereis_name(?MODULE).
 1986: 
 1987: do_otp_7669_stop() ->
 1988:     %% The name should never be registered after the return
 1989:     %% from gen_server:start/3.
 1990:     {error,stopped} = gen_server:start({local,?MODULE},
 1991: 				       ?MODULE, stop, []),
 1992:     undefined = whereis(?MODULE),
 1993: 
 1994:     {error,stopped} = gen_server:start({global,?MODULE},
 1995: 				       ?MODULE, stop, []),
 1996:     undefined = global:whereis_name(?MODULE).
 1997: 
 1998: %% Verify that sys:get_status correctly calls our format_status/1,2 fun.
 1999: call_format_status(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2000:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2001:     call_format_status(?MODULE, format_status_called),
 2002:     call_format_status(format_status_server,{data,[{"State",format_status_called}]}),
 2003:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl).
 2004: call_format_status(Module, Match) when is_atom(Module) ->
 2005: 
 2006:     Parent = self(),
 2007: 
 2008:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server:start_link({local, call_format_status},
 2009: 				      Module, [], []),
 2010:     Status1 = sys:get_status(call_format_status),
 2011:     {status, Pid, Mod, [_Pdict1, running, Parent, _, Data1]} = Status1,
 2012:     [Match | _] = lists:reverse(Data1),
 2013:     Status2 = sys:get_status(call_format_status, 5000),
 2014:     {status, Pid, Mod, [_Pdict2, running, Parent, _, Data2]} = Status2,
 2015:     [Match | _] = lists:reverse(Data2),
 2016:     gen_server:call(Pid, stop),
 2017:     receive {'EXIT',_,_} -> ok end,
 2018: 
 2019:     %% check that format_status can handle a name being a pid (atom is
 2020:     %% already checked by the previous test)
 2021:     {ok, Pid3} = gen_server:start_link(Module, [], []),
 2022:     Status3 = sys:get_status(Pid3),
 2023:     {status, Pid3, Mod, [_PDict3, running, Parent, _, Data3]} = Status3,
 2024:     [Match | _] = lists:reverse(Data3),
 2025:     gen_server:call(Pid3, stop),
 2026:     receive {'EXIT',_,_} -> ok end,
 2027: 
 2028:     %% check that format_status can handle a name being a term other than a
 2029:     %% pid or atom
 2030:     GlobalName1 = {global, "CallFormatStatus"},
 2031:     {ok, Pid4} = gen_server:start_link(GlobalName1, Module, [], []),
 2032:     Status4 = sys:get_status(Pid4),
 2033:     {status, Pid4, Mod, [_PDict4, running, Parent, _, Data4]} = Status4,
 2034:     [Match | _] = lists:reverse(Data4),
 2035:     gen_server:call(Pid4, stop),
 2036:     receive {'EXIT',_,_} -> ok end,
 2037:     GlobalName2 = {global, {name, "term"}},
 2038:     {ok, Pid5} = gen_server:start_link(GlobalName2, Module, [], []),
 2039:     Status5 = sys:get_status(GlobalName2),
 2040:     {status, Pid5, Mod, [_PDict5, running, Parent, _, Data5]} = Status5,
 2041:     [Match | _] = lists:reverse(Data5),
 2042:     gen_server:call(Pid5, stop),
 2043:     receive {'EXIT',_,_} -> ok end,
 2044:     ok.
 2045: 
 2046: %% Verify that error termination correctly calls our format_status/1,2 fun.
 2047: error_format_status(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2048:     error_logger_forwarder:register(),
 2049:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2050:     error_format_status(?MODULE),
 2051:     error_format_status(format_status_server),
 2052:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl);
 2053: error_format_status(Module) when is_atom(Module) ->
 2054: 
 2055:     State = "called format_status",
 2056:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server:start_link(Module, {state, State}, []),
 2057:     {'EXIT',{crashed,_}} = (catch gen_server:call(Pid, crash)),
 2058:     receive
 2059: 	{'EXIT', Pid, crashed} ->
 2060: 	    ok
 2061:     end,
 2062:     ClientPid = self(),
 2063:     receive
 2064: 	{error,_GroupLeader,{Pid,
 2065: 			     "** Generic server"++_,
 2066: 			     [Pid,crash,{formatted, State},
 2067: 			      {crashed,[{?MODULE,handle_call,3,_}
 2068: 					|_Stacktrace]},
 2069: 			       ClientPid, [_|_] = _ClientStack]}} ->
 2070: 	    ok;
 2071: 	Other ->
 2072: 	    ct:pal("Unexpected: ~p", [Other]),
 2073: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 2074:     end,
 2075:     receive
 2076:         {error_report,_,_} -> ok
 2077:     end,
 2078:     ok.
 2079: 
 2080: %% Verify that error when terminating correctly calls our format_status/1,2 fun
 2081: terminate_crash_format(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2082:     error_logger_forwarder:register(),
 2083:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2084:     terminate_crash_format(?MODULE),
 2085:     terminate_crash_format(format_status_server),
 2086:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl);
 2087: terminate_crash_format(Module) when is_atom(Module) ->
 2088:     State = crash_terminate,
 2089:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server:start_link(Module, {state, State}, []),
 2090:     gen_server:call(Pid, stop),
 2091:     receive {'EXIT', Pid, {crash, terminate}} -> ok end,
 2092:     ClientPid = self(),
 2093:     receive
 2094: 	{error,_GroupLeader,{Pid,
 2095: 			     "** Generic server"++_,
 2096: 			     [Pid,stop, {formatted, State},
 2097: 			      {{crash, terminate},
 2098: 			       [{?MODULE,terminate,2,_}|_Stacktrace]},
 2099: 			       ClientPid, [_|_] = _ClientStack]}} ->
 2100: 	    ok;
 2101: 	Other ->
 2102: 	    io:format("Unexpected: ~p", [Other]),
 2103: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 2104:     after 5000 ->
 2105: 	    io:format("Timeout: expected error logger msg", []),
 2106: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 2107:     end,
 2108:     receive
 2109:         {error_report,_,_} -> ok
 2110:     end,
 2111:     ok.
 2112: 
 2113: crash_in_format_status(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2114:     error_logger_forwarder:register(),
 2115:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2116:     crash_in_format_status(?MODULE, "gen_server_SUITE:format_status/2 crashed"),
 2117:     crash_in_format_status(format_status_server, "format_status_server:format_status/1 crashed"),
 2118:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl).
 2119: crash_in_format_status(Module, Match) when is_atom(Module) ->
 2120:     State = fun(_) -> exit({crash,format_status}) end,
 2121:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server:start_link(Module, {state, State}, []),
 2122: 
 2123:     {status,Pid, _, [_,_,_,_,Info]} = sys:get_status(Pid),
 2124:     {data,[{"State",Match}]} = lists:last(Info),
 2125: 
 2126:     gen_server:call(Pid, stop),
 2127:     receive {'EXIT', Pid, stopped} -> ok end,
 2128:     ClientPid = self(),
 2129:     receive
 2130: 	{error,_GroupLeader,
 2131:          {Pid,
 2132:           "** Generic server"++_,
 2133:           [Pid, stop, Match, stopped,
 2134:            ClientPid, [_|_] = _ClientStack]}} ->
 2135: 	    ok;
 2136: 	Other ->
 2137: 	    ct:pal("Unexpected: ~p", [Other]),
 2138: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 2139:     after 5000 ->
 2140: 	    io:format("Timeout: expected error logger msg", []),
 2141: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 2142:     end,
 2143:     receive
 2144:         {error_report,_,_} -> ok
 2145:     end,
 2146:     ok.
 2147: 
 2148: throw_in_format_status(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2149:     error_logger_forwarder:register(),
 2150:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2151:     throw_in_format_status(?MODULE,{throw,format_status}),
 2152:     throw_in_format_status(format_status_server,"format_status_server:format_status/1 crashed"),
 2153:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl).
 2154: throw_in_format_status(Module, Match) when is_atom(Module) ->
 2155:     State = fun(_) -> throw({throw,format_status}) end,
 2156:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server:start_link(Module, {state, State}, []),
 2157: 
 2158:     {status,Pid, _, [_,_,_,_,Info]} = sys:get_status(Pid),
 2159:     case lists:last(Info) of
 2160:         {data,[{"State",Match}]} ->
 2161:             ok;
 2162:         Match ->
 2163:             ok
 2164:     end,
 2165: 
 2166:     gen_server:call(Pid, stop),
 2167:     receive {'EXIT', Pid, stopped} -> ok end,
 2168:     ClientPid = self(),
 2169:     receive
 2170: 	{error,_GroupLeader,
 2171:          {Pid, "** Generic server"++_,
 2172:           [Pid, stop, Match, stopped,
 2173:            ClientPid, [_|_] = _ClientStack]}} ->
 2174: 	    ok;
 2175: 	Other ->
 2176: 	    ct:pal("Unexpected: ~p", [Other]),
 2177: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 2178:     after 5000 ->
 2179: 	    io:format("Timeout: expected error logger msg", []),
 2180: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 2181:     end,
 2182:     receive
 2183:         {error_report,_,_} -> ok
 2184:     end,
 2185:     ok.
 2186: 
 2187: %% Test that the state, reason, message format status calls works as they should
 2188: %% The test makes sure that both sys:get_status and the crash report works as they
 2189: %% should and can be used to strip data from both the reason, message, state and the
 2190: %% sys logger logs.
 2191: 
 2192: %%%% The sys logger log messages that should be matched
 2193: -define(LOG_MESSAGES,
 2194:         {log,{in,{_,_,started_p}}},
 2195:         {log,{out,ok,_,State}},
 2196:         {log,{in,{_,_,{delayed_answer,10}}}},
 2197:         {log,{noreply,{_,_,State}}},
 2198:         {log,{in,timeout}},
 2199:         {log,{noreply,State}}).
 2200: 
 2201: format_all_status(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2202:     error_logger_forwarder:register(),
 2203:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2204: 
 2205:     State = fun(M) ->
 2206:                     maps:map(
 2207:                       fun(log, Values) ->
 2208:                               [{log, Value} || Value <- Values];
 2209:                          (Key, Value) ->
 2210:                               {Key, Value}
 2211:                       end, M)
 2212:             end,
 2213:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server:start_link(format_status_server, {state, State}, []),
 2214:     sys:log(Pid, true),
 2215:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid, started_p),
 2216:     delayed = gen_server:call(Pid, {delayed_answer, 10}),
 2217: 
 2218:     {status,Pid, _, [_,_,_,_,Info]} = sys:get_status(Pid),
 2219:     [{header, _Hdr},
 2220:      {data, [_Status,_Parent,{"Logged events",LoggedEvents}]},
 2221:      {data, [{"State",{state,State}}]}] = Info,
 2222: 
 2223:     [?LOG_MESSAGES] = LoggedEvents,
 2224: 
 2225:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid, stop),
 2226:     receive {'EXIT', Pid, stopped} -> ok end,
 2227:     ClientPid = self(),
 2228:     receive
 2229: 	{error,_GroupLeader,
 2230:          {Pid, "** Generic server"++_,
 2231:           [Pid, {message, stop}, {state,State}, {reason, stopped},
 2232:            ?LOG_MESSAGES, {log,{in,{_,_,stop}}},
 2233:            ClientPid, [_|_] = _ClientStack]}} ->
 2234: 	    ok;
 2235: 	Other ->
 2236: 	    ct:pal("Unexpected: ~p", [Other]),
 2237: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 2238:     after 5000 ->
 2239: 	    io:format("Timeout: expected error logger msg", []),
 2240: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 2241:     end,
 2242:     receive
 2243:         {error_report,_,_} -> ok
 2244:     end,
 2245: 
 2246:     {ok, Pid2} = gen_server:start_link(format_status_server, {state, State}, []),
 2247:     catch gen_server:call(Pid2, crash),
 2248:     receive {'EXIT', Pid2, crashed} -> ok end,
 2249:     receive
 2250: 	{error,_GroupLeader2,
 2251:          {Pid2, "** Generic server"++_,
 2252:           [Pid2, {message, crash}, {state,State},
 2253:            {{reason, crashed},[_|_] = _ServerStack},
 2254:            ClientPid, [_|_] = _ClientStack2]}} ->
 2255: 	    ok;
 2256: 	Other2 ->
 2257: 	    ct:pal("Unexpected: ~p", [Other2]),
 2258: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 2259:     after 5000 ->
 2260: 	    io:format("Timeout: expected error logger msg", []),
 2261: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 2262:     end,
 2263:     receive
 2264:         {error_report,_,_} -> ok
 2265:     end,
 2266: 
 2267:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl).
 2268: 
 2269: %% Verify that sys:get_state correctly returns gen_server state
 2270: get_state(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2271:     State = self(),
 2272:     {ok, _Pid} = gen_server:start_link({local, get_state},
 2273: 				       ?MODULE, {state,State}, []),
 2274:     State = sys:get_state(get_state),
 2275:     State = sys:get_state(get_state, 5000),
 2276:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server:start_link(?MODULE, {state,State}, []),
 2277:     State = sys:get_state(Pid),
 2278:     State = sys:get_state(Pid, 5000),
 2279:     ok = sys:suspend(Pid),
 2280:     State = sys:get_state(Pid),
 2281:     ok = sys:resume(Pid),
 2282:     ok.
 2283: 
 2284: %% Verify that sys:replace_state correctly replaces gen_server state
 2285: replace_state(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2286:     State = self(),
 2287:     {ok, _Pid} = gen_server:start_link({local, replace_state},
 2288: 				       ?MODULE, {state,State}, []),
 2289:     State = sys:get_state(replace_state),
 2290:     NState1 = "replaced",
 2291:     Replace1 = fun(_) -> NState1 end,
 2292:     NState1 = sys:replace_state(replace_state, Replace1),
 2293:     NState1 = sys:get_state(replace_state),
 2294:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server:start_link(?MODULE, {state,NState1}, []),
 2295:     NState1 = sys:get_state(Pid),
 2296:     Suffix = " again",
 2297:     NState2 = NState1 ++ Suffix,
 2298:     Replace2 = fun(S) -> S ++ Suffix end,
 2299:     NState2 = sys:replace_state(Pid, Replace2, 5000),
 2300:     NState2 = sys:get_state(Pid, 5000),
 2301:     %% verify no change in state if replace function crashes
 2302:     Replace3 = fun(_) -> throw(fail) end,
 2303:     {'EXIT',{{callback_failed,
 2304: 	      {gen_server,system_replace_state},{throw,fail}},_}} =
 2305: 	(catch sys:replace_state(Pid, Replace3)),
 2306:     NState2 = sys:get_state(Pid, 5000),
 2307:     %% verify state replaced if process sys suspended
 2308:     ok = sys:suspend(Pid),
 2309:     Suffix2 = " and again",
 2310:     NState3 = NState2 ++ Suffix2,
 2311:     Replace4 = fun(S) -> S ++ Suffix2 end,
 2312:     NState3 = sys:replace_state(Pid, Replace4),
 2313:     ok = sys:resume(Pid),
 2314:     NState3 = sys:get_state(Pid, 5000),
 2315:     ok.
 2316: 
 2317: %% Test that the time for a huge message queue is not
 2318: %% significantly slower than with an empty message queue.
 2319: call_with_huge_message_queue(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2320:     Pid = spawn_link(fun echo_loop/0),
 2321: 
 2322:     {Time,ok} = tc(fun() -> calls(10000, Pid) end),
 2323: 
 2324:     _ = [self() ! {msg,N} || N <- lists:seq(1, 500000)],
 2325:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2326:     {NewTime,ok} = tc(fun() -> calls(10000, Pid) end),
 2327:     io:format("Time for empty message queue: ~p", [Time]),
 2328:     io:format("Time for huge message queue: ~p", [NewTime]),
 2329: 
 2330:     IsCover = test_server:is_cover(),
 2331:     case (NewTime+1) / (Time+1) of
 2332: 	Q when Q < 10; IsCover ->
 2333: 	    ok;
 2334: 	Q ->
 2335: 	    io:format("Q = ~p", [Q]),
 2336: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 2337:     end,
 2338:     ok.
 2339: 
 2340: calls(0, _) -> ok;
 2341: calls(N, Pid) ->
 2342:     {ultimate_answer,42} = call(Pid, {ultimate_answer,42}),
 2343:     calls(N-1, Pid).
 2344: 
 2345: call(Pid, Msg) ->
 2346:     gen_server:call(Pid, Msg, infinity).
 2347: 
 2348: tc(Fun) ->
 2349:     timer:tc(erlang, apply, [Fun,[]]).
 2350: 
 2351: echo_loop() ->
 2352:     receive
 2353: 	{'$gen_call',{Pid,Ref},Msg} ->
 2354: 	    Pid ! {Ref,Msg},
 2355: 	    echo_loop()
 2356:     end.
 2357: 
 2358: %% Test the default implementation of terminate if the callback module
 2359: %% does not export it
 2360: undef_terminate1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2361:     {ok, Server} = oc_server:start(),
 2362:     MRef = monitor(process, Server),
 2363:     ok = gen_server:stop(Server),
 2364:     ok = verify_down_reason(MRef, Server, normal).
 2365: 
 2366: %% Test the default implementation of terminate if the callback module
 2367: %% does not export it
 2368: undef_terminate2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2369:     {ok, Server} = oc_server:start(),
 2370:     MRef = monitor(process, Server),
 2371:     ok = gen_server:stop(Server, {error, test}, infinity),
 2372:     ok = verify_down_reason(MRef, Server, {error, test}).
 2373: 
 2374: %% Start should return an undef error if init isn't implemented
 2375: undef_init(_Config) ->
 2376:     {error, {undef, [{oc_init_server, init, [_], _}|_]}} =
 2377:         gen_server:start(oc_init_server, [], []),
 2378:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2379:     {error, {undef, [{oc_init_server, init, [_], _}|_]}} =
 2380:         (catch gen_server:start_link(oc_init_server, [], [])),
 2381:     receive
 2382:         Msg ->
 2383:             ct:fail({unexpected_msg, Msg})
 2384:     after 500 ->
 2385:             ok
 2386:     end.
 2387: 
 2388: %% The upgrade should fail if code_change is expected in the callback module
 2389: %% but not exported, but the server should continue with the old code
 2390: undef_code_change(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2391:     {ok, Server} = oc_server:start(),
 2392:     {error, {'EXIT', {undef, [{oc_server, code_change, [_, _, _], _}|_]}}}
 2393:         = fake_upgrade(Server, ?MODULE),
 2394:     true = is_process_alive(Server).
 2395: 
 2396: %% The server should crash if the handle_call callback is
 2397: %% not exported in the callback module
 2398: undef_handle_call(_Config) ->
 2399:     {ok, Server} = oc_server:start(),
 2400:     try
 2401:         gen_server:call(Server, call_msg),
 2402:         ct:fail(should_crash)
 2403:     catch exit:{{undef, [{oc_server, handle_call, _, _}|_]},
 2404:                 {gen_server, call, _}} ->
 2405:         ok
 2406:     end.
 2407: 
 2408: %% The server should crash if the handle_cast callback is
 2409: %% not exported in the callback module
 2410: undef_handle_cast(_Config) ->
 2411:     {ok, Server} = oc_server:start(),
 2412:     MRef = monitor(process, Server),
 2413:     gen_server:cast(Server, cast_msg),
 2414:     verify_undef_down(MRef, Server, oc_server, handle_cast),
 2415:     ok.
 2416: 
 2417: %% The server should crash if the handle_continue callback is
 2418: %% not exported in the callback module
 2419: undef_handle_continue(_Config) ->
 2420:     {ok, Server} = oc_server:start(continue),
 2421:     MRef = monitor(process, Server),
 2422:     verify_undef_down(MRef, Server, oc_server, handle_continue),
 2423:     ok.
 2424: 
 2425: %% The server should log but not crash if the handle_info callback is
 2426: %% calling an undefined function
 2427: undef_handle_info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2428:     error_logger_forwarder:register(),
 2429:     {ok, Server} = oc_server:start(),
 2430:     Server ! hej,
 2431:     wait_until_processed(Server, hej, 10),
 2432:     true = is_process_alive(Server),
 2433:     receive
 2434:         {warning_msg, _GroupLeader,
 2435:          {Server, "** Undefined handle_info in " ++ _, [oc_server, hej]}} ->
 2436:             ok;
 2437:         Other ->
 2438:             io:format("Unexpected: ~p", [Other]),
 2439:             ct:fail(failed)
 2440:     end.
 2441: 
 2442: %% Test that the default implementation of terminate isn't catching the
 2443: %% wrong undef error
 2444: undef_in_terminate(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2445:     State = {undef_in_terminate, {oc_server, terminate}},
 2446:     {ok, Server} = gen_server:start(?MODULE, {state, State}, []),
 2447:     try
 2448:         ok = gen_server:stop(Server),
 2449:         ct:fail(failed)
 2450:     catch
 2451:         exit:{undef, [{oc_server, terminate, [], _}|_]} ->
 2452:             ok
 2453:     end.
 2454: 
 2455: %% Test that the default implementation of handle_info isn't catching the
 2456: %% wrong undef error
 2457: undef_in_handle_info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2458:      {ok, Server} = gen_server:start(?MODULE, [], []),
 2459:      MRef = monitor(process, Server),
 2460:      Server ! {call_undef_fun, ?MODULE, handle_info},
 2461:      verify_undef_down(MRef, Server, ?MODULE, handle_info),
 2462:      ok.
 2463: 
 2464: verify_down_reason(MRef, Server, Reason) ->
 2465:     receive
 2466:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Server, Reason} ->
 2467:             ok
 2468:     after 5000 ->
 2469:         ct:fail(failed)
 2470:     end.
 2471: 
 2472: verify_undef_down(MRef, Pid, Mod, Fun) ->
 2473:     ok = receive
 2474:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid,
 2475:          {undef, [{Mod, Fun, _, _}|_]}} ->
 2476:             ok
 2477:     after 5000 ->
 2478:         ct:fail(should_crash)
 2479:     end.
 2480: 
 2481: fake_upgrade(Pid, Mod) ->
 2482:     sys:suspend(Pid),
 2483:     sys:replace_state(Pid, fun(State) -> {new, State} end),
 2484:     Ret = sys:change_code(Pid, Mod, old_vsn, []),
 2485:     ok = sys:resume(Pid),
 2486:     Ret.
 2487: 
 2488: wait_until_processed(_Pid, _Message, 0) ->
 2489:     ct:fail(not_processed);
 2490: wait_until_processed(Pid, Message, N) ->
 2491:     {messages, Messages} = erlang:process_info(Pid, messages),
 2492:     case lists:member(Message, Messages) of
 2493:         true ->
 2494:             timer:sleep(100),
 2495:             wait_until_processed(Pid, Message, N-1);
 2496:         false ->
 2497:             ok
 2498:     end.
 2499: 
 2500: %% Test report callback for Logger handler error_logger
 2501: format_log_1(_Config) ->
 2502:     FD = application:get_env(kernel,error_logger_format_depth),
 2503:     application:unset_env(kernel,error_logger_format_depth),
 2504:     Term = lists:seq(1,15),
 2505:     Name = self(),
 2506:     Report = #{label=>{gen_server,terminate},
 2507:                name=>Name,
 2508:                last_message=>Term,
 2509:                state=>Term,
 2510:                log=>[],
 2511:                reason=>Term,
 2512:                client_info=>{self(),{clientname,[]}}},
 2513:     {F1,A1} = gen_server:format_log(Report),
 2514:     FExpected1 = "** Generic server ~tp terminating \n"
 2515:         "** Last message in was ~tp~n"
 2516:         "** When Server state == ~tp~n"
 2517:         "** Reason for termination ==~n** ~tp~n"
 2518:         "** Client ~tp stacktrace~n"
 2519:         "** ~tp~n",
 2520:     ct:log("F1: ~ts~nA1: ~tp",[F1,A1]),
 2521:     FExpected1=F1,
 2522:     [Name,Term,Term,Term,clientname,[]] = A1,
 2523: 
 2524:     Warning = #{label=>{gen_server,no_handle_info},
 2525:                 module=>?MODULE,
 2526:                 message=>Term},
 2527:     {WF1,WA1} = gen_server:format_log(Warning),
 2528:     WFExpected1 = "** Undefined handle_info in ~p~n"
 2529:         "** Unhandled message: ~tp~n",
 2530:     ct:log("WF1: ~ts~nWA1: ~tp",[WF1,WA1]),
 2531:     WFExpected1=WF1,
 2532:     [?MODULE,Term] = WA1,
 2533: 
 2534:     Depth = 10,
 2535:     ok = application:set_env(kernel,error_logger_format_depth,Depth),
 2536:     Limited = [1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,'...'],
 2537:     {F2,A2} = gen_server:format_log(#{label=>{gen_server,terminate},
 2538:                                       name=>Name,
 2539:                                       last_message=>Term,
 2540:                                       state=>Term,
 2541:                                       log=>[],
 2542:                                       reason=>Term,
 2543:                                       client_info=>{self(),{clientname,[]}}}),
 2544:     FExpected2 = "** Generic server ~tP terminating \n"
 2545:         "** Last message in was ~tP~n"
 2546:         "** When Server state == ~tP~n"
 2547:         "** Reason for termination ==~n** ~tP~n"
 2548:         "** Client ~tP stacktrace~n"
 2549:         "** ~tP~n",
 2550:     ct:log("F2: ~ts~nA2: ~tp",[F2,A2]),
 2551:     FExpected2=F2,
 2552:     [Name,Depth,Limited,Depth,Limited,Depth,Limited,Depth,
 2553:      clientname,Depth,[],Depth] = A2,
 2554: 
 2555:     {WF2,WA2} = gen_server:format_log(Warning),
 2556:     WFExpected2 = "** Undefined handle_info in ~p~n"
 2557:         "** Unhandled message: ~tP~n",
 2558:     ct:log("WF2: ~ts~nWA2: ~tp",[WF2,WA2]),
 2559:     WFExpected2=WF2,
 2560:     [?MODULE,Limited,Depth] = WA2,
 2561: 
 2562:     case FD of
 2563:         undefined ->
 2564:             application:unset_env(kernel,error_logger_format_depth);
 2565:         _ ->
 2566:             application:set_env(kernel,error_logger_format_depth,FD)
 2567:     end,
 2568:     ok.
 2569: 
 2570: %% Test report callback for any Logger handler
 2571: format_log_2(_Config) ->
 2572:     Term = lists:seq(1,15),
 2573:     Name = self(),
 2574:     NameStr = pid_to_list(Name),
 2575:     Report = #{label=>{gen_server,terminate},
 2576:                name=>Name,
 2577:                last_message=>Term,
 2578:                state=>Term,
 2579:                log=>[],
 2580:                reason=>Term,
 2581:                client_info=>{self(),{clientname,[]}}},
 2582:     FormatOpts1 = #{},
 2583:     Str1 = flatten_format_log(Report,FormatOpts1),
 2584:     L1 = length(Str1),
 2585:     Expected1 = "** Generic server "++NameStr++" terminating \n"
 2586:         "** Last message in was ",
 2587:     ct:log("Str1: ~ts",[Str1]),
 2588:     ct:log("length(Str1): ~p",[L1]),
 2589:     true = lists:prefix(Expected1,Str1),
 2590: 
 2591:     Warning = #{label=>{gen_server,no_handle_info},
 2592:                 module=>?MODULE,
 2593:                 message=>Term},
 2594:     WStr1 = flatten_format_log(Warning,FormatOpts1),
 2595:     WL1 = length(WStr1),
 2596:     WExpected1 = "** Undefined handle_info in gen_server_SUITE\n"
 2597:         "** Unhandled message: ",
 2598:     ct:log("WStr1: ~ts",[WStr1]),
 2599:     ct:log("length(WStr1): ~p",[WL1]),
 2600:     true = lists:prefix(WExpected1,WStr1),
 2601: 
 2602:     Depth = 10,
 2603:     FormatOpts2 = #{depth=>Depth},
 2604:     Str2 = flatten_format_log(Report,FormatOpts2),
 2605:     L2 = length(Str2),
 2606:     Expected2 = "** Generic server "++NameStr++" terminating \n"
 2607:         "** Last message in was ",
 2608:     ct:log("Str2: ~ts",[Str2]),
 2609:     ct:log("length(Str2): ~p",[L2]),
 2610:     true = lists:prefix(Expected2,Str2),
 2611:     true = L2<L1,
 2612: 
 2613:     WStr2 = flatten_format_log(Warning,FormatOpts2),
 2614:     WL2 = length(WStr2),
 2615:     WExpected2 = "** Undefined handle_info in gen_server_SUITE\n"
 2616:         "** Unhandled message: ",
 2617:     ct:log("WStr2: ~ts",[WStr2]),
 2618:     ct:log("length(WStr2): ~p",[WL2]),
 2619:     true = lists:prefix(WExpected2,WStr2),
 2620:     true = WL2<WL1,
 2621: 
 2622:     FormatOpts3 = #{chars_limit=>200},
 2623:     Str3 = flatten_format_log(Report,FormatOpts3),
 2624:     L3 = length(Str3),
 2625:     Expected3 = "** Generic server "++NameStr++" terminating \n"
 2626:         "** Last message in was ",
 2627:     ct:log("Str3: ~ts",[Str3]),
 2628:     ct:log("length(Str3): ~p",[L3]),
 2629:     true = lists:prefix(Expected3,Str3),
 2630:     true = L3<L1,
 2631: 
 2632:     WFormatOpts3 = #{chars_limit=>80},
 2633:     WStr3 = flatten_format_log(Warning,WFormatOpts3),
 2634:     WL3 = length(WStr3),
 2635:     WExpected3 = "** Undefined handle_info in gen_server_SUITE\n"
 2636:         "** Unhandled message: ",
 2637:     ct:log("WStr3: ~ts",[WStr3]),
 2638:     ct:log("length(WStr3): ~p",[WL3]),
 2639:     true = lists:prefix(WExpected3,WStr3),
 2640:     true = WL3<WL1,
 2641: 
 2642:     FormatOpts4 = #{single_line=>true},
 2643:     Str4 = flatten_format_log(Report,FormatOpts4),
 2644:     L4 = length(Str4),
 2645:     Expected4 = "Generic server "++NameStr++" terminating. Reason: ",
 2646:     ct:log("Str4: ~ts",[Str4]),
 2647:     ct:log("length(Str4): ~p",[L4]),
 2648:     true = lists:prefix(Expected4,Str4),
 2649:     true = L4<L1,
 2650: 
 2651:     WStr4 = flatten_format_log(Warning,FormatOpts4),
 2652:     WL4 = length(WStr4),
 2653:     WExpected4 = "Undefined handle_info in gen_server_SUITE. "
 2654:         "Unhandled message: ",
 2655:     ct:log("WStr4: ~ts",[WStr4]),
 2656:     ct:log("length(WStr4): ~p",[WL4]),
 2657:     true = lists:prefix(WExpected4,WStr4),
 2658:     true = WL4<WL1,
 2659: 
 2660:     FormatOpts5 = #{single_line=>true, depth=>Depth},
 2661:     Str5 = flatten_format_log(Report,FormatOpts5),
 2662:     L5 = length(Str5),
 2663:     Expected5 = "Generic server "++NameStr++" terminating. Reason: ",
 2664:     ct:log("Str5: ~ts",[Str5]),
 2665:     ct:log("length(Str5): ~p",[L5]),
 2666:     true = lists:prefix(Expected5,Str5),
 2667:     true = L5<L4,
 2668: 
 2669:     WStr5 = flatten_format_log(Warning,FormatOpts5),
 2670:     WL5 = length(WStr5),
 2671:     WExpected5 = "Undefined handle_info in gen_server_SUITE. "
 2672:         "Unhandled message: ",
 2673:     ct:log("WStr5: ~ts",[WStr5]),
 2674:     ct:log("length(WStr5): ~p",[WL5]),
 2675:     true = lists:prefix(WExpected5,WStr5),
 2676:     true = WL5<WL4,
 2677: 
 2678:     FormatOpts6 = #{single_line=>true, chars_limit=>200},
 2679:     Str6 = flatten_format_log(Report,FormatOpts6),
 2680:     L6 = length(Str6),
 2681:     Expected6 = "Generic server "++NameStr++" terminating. Reason: ",
 2682:     ct:log("Str6: ~ts",[Str6]),
 2683:     ct:log("length(Str6): ~p",[L6]),
 2684:     true = lists:prefix(Expected6,Str6),
 2685:     true = L6<L4,
 2686: 
 2687:     WFormatOpts6 = #{single_line=>true, chars_limit=>80},
 2688:     WStr6 = flatten_format_log(Warning,WFormatOpts6),
 2689:     WL6 = length(WStr6),
 2690:     WExpected6 = "Undefined handle_info in gen_server_SUITE. "
 2691:         "Unhandled message: ",
 2692:     ct:log("WStr6: ~ts",[WStr6]),
 2693:     ct:log("length(WStr6): ~p",[WL6]),
 2694:     true = lists:prefix(WExpected6,WStr6),
 2695:     true = WL6<WL4,
 2696: 
 2697:     ok.
 2698: 
 2699: flatten_format_log(Report, Format) ->
 2700:     lists:flatten(gen_server:format_log(Report, Format)).
 2701: 
 2702: reply_by_alias_with_payload(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2703:     %% "Payload" version of tag not used yet, but make sure
 2704:     %% gen_server:reply/2 works with it...
 2705:     %%
 2706:     %% Whitebox...
 2707:     Reply = make_ref(),
 2708:     Alias = alias(),
 2709:     Tag = [[alias|Alias], "payload"],
 2710:     spawn_link(fun () ->
 2711:                        gen_server:reply({undefined, Tag},
 2712:                                         Reply)
 2713:                end),
 2714:     receive
 2715:         {[[alias|Alias]|_] = Tag, Reply} ->
 2716:             ok
 2717:     end,
 2718:     %% Check gen:reply/2 as well...
 2719:     Reply2 = make_ref(),
 2720:     Alias2 = alias(),
 2721:     Tag2 = [[alias|Alias2], "payload"],
 2722:     spawn_link(fun () ->
 2723:                        gen:reply({undefined, Tag2},
 2724:                                  Reply2)
 2725:                end),
 2726:     receive
 2727:         {[[alias|Alias2]|_] = Tag2, Reply2} ->
 2728:             ok
 2729:     end.
 2730: 
 2731: %%--------------------------------------------------------------
 2732: %% Help functions to spec_init_*
 2733: start_link(Init, Options) ->
 2734:     proc_lib:start_link(?MODULE, Init, Options).
 2735: 
 2736: spec_init_local({ok, Name}, Options) ->
 2737:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2738:     register(Name, self()),
 2739:     proc_lib:init_ack({ok, self()}),
 2740:     %% Supervised init can occur here  ...
 2741:     gen_server:enter_loop(?MODULE, Options, {}, {local, Name}, infinity);
 2742: 
 2743: spec_init_local({not_ok, Name}, Options) ->
 2744:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2745:     proc_lib:init_ack({ok, self()}),
 2746:     %% Supervised init can occur here  ...
 2747:     gen_server:enter_loop(?MODULE, Options, {}, {local, Name}, infinity).
 2748: 
 2749: spec_init_global({ok, Name}, Options) ->
 2750:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2751:     global:register_name(Name, self()),
 2752:     proc_lib:init_ack({ok, self()}),
 2753:     %% Supervised init can occur here  ...
 2754:     gen_server:enter_loop(?MODULE, Options, {}, {global, Name}, infinity);
 2755: 
 2756: spec_init_global({not_ok, Name}, Options) ->
 2757:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2758:     proc_lib:init_ack({ok, self()}),
 2759:     %% Supervised init can occur here  ...
 2760:     gen_server:enter_loop(?MODULE, Options, {}, {global, Name}, infinity).
 2761: 
 2762: spec_init_via({ok, Name}, Options) ->
 2763:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2764:     dummy_via:register_name(Name, self()),
 2765:     proc_lib:init_ack({ok, self()}),
 2766:     %% Supervised init can occur here  ...
 2767:     gen_server:enter_loop(?MODULE, Options, {},
 2768: 			  {via, dummy_via, Name}, infinity);
 2769: 
 2770: spec_init_via({not_ok, Name}, Options) ->
 2771:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2772:     proc_lib:init_ack({ok, self()}),
 2773:     %% Supervised init can occur here  ...
 2774:     gen_server:enter_loop(?MODULE, Options, {},
 2775: 			  {via, dummy_via, Name}, infinity).
 2776: 
 2777: spec_init_default_timeout({ok, Name}, Options) ->
 2778:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2779:     register(Name, self()),
 2780:     proc_lib:init_ack({ok, self()}),
 2781:     %% Supervised init can occur here  ...
 2782:     gen_server:enter_loop(?MODULE, Options, {}, {local, Name}).
 2783: 
 2784: %% OTP-10130, A bug was introduced where global scope was not matched when
 2785: %% enter_loop/4 was called (no timeout).
 2786: spec_init_global_default_timeout({ok, Name}, Options) ->
 2787:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2788:     global:register_name(Name, self()),
 2789:     proc_lib:init_ack({ok, self()}),
 2790:     %% Supervised init can occur here  ...
 2791:     gen_server:enter_loop(?MODULE, Options, {}, {global, Name}).
 2792: 
 2793: spec_init_anonymous(Options) ->
 2794:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2795:     proc_lib:init_ack({ok, self()}),
 2796:     %% Supervised init can occur here  ...
 2797:     gen_server:enter_loop(?MODULE, Options, {}, infinity).
 2798: 
 2799: spec_init_anonymous_default_timeout(Options) ->
 2800:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2801:     proc_lib:init_ack({ok, self()}),
 2802:     %% Supervised init can occur here  ...
 2803:     gen_server:enter_loop(?MODULE, Options, {}).
 2804: 
 2805: spec_init_not_proc_lib(Options) ->
 2806:     gen_server:enter_loop(?MODULE, Options, {}, infinity).
 2807: 
 2808: %%% --------------------------------------------------------
 2809: %%% Here is the tested gen_server behaviour.
 2810: %%% --------------------------------------------------------
 2811: 
 2812: init([]) ->
 2813:     {ok, []};
 2814: init(ignore) ->
 2815:     io:format("init(ignore)~n"),
 2816:     ignore;
 2817: init({error, Reason}) ->
 2818:     io:format("init(error) -> ~w~n", [Reason]),
 2819:     {error, Reason};
 2820: init(stop) ->
 2821:     io:format("init(stop)~n"),
 2822:     {stop, stopped};
 2823: init(hibernate) ->
 2824:     io:format("init(hibernate)~n"),
 2825:     {ok,[],hibernate};
 2826: init(sleep) ->
 2827:     io:format("init(sleep)~n"),
 2828:     ct:sleep(1000),
 2829:     {ok, []};
 2830: init({continue, Pid}) ->
 2831:     io:format("init(continue) -> ~p~n", [Pid]),
 2832:     self() ! {after_continue, Pid},
 2833:     {ok, [], {continue, {message, Pid}}};
 2834: init({state,State}) ->
 2835:     io:format("init(state) -> ~p~n", [State]),
 2836:     {ok,State};
 2837: init({ets,InitResult}) ->
 2838:     ?MODULE = ets:new(?MODULE, [named_table]),
 2839:     case InitResult of
 2840:         {return, Value} ->
 2841:             Value;
 2842:         {crash, Class, Reason} ->
 2843:             erlang:Class(Reason);
 2844:         {wait, Time, Value} ->
 2845:             receive after Time -> Value end
 2846:     end.
 2847: 
 2848: handle_call(started_p, _From, State) ->
 2849:     io:format("FROZ"),
 2850:     {reply,ok,State};
 2851: handle_call(ping, _From, State) ->
 2852:     {reply,pong,State};
 2853: handle_call({delayed_answer, T}, From, State) ->
 2854:     {noreply,{reply_to,From,State},T};
 2855: handle_call({call_within, T}, _From, _) ->
 2856:     {reply,ok,call_within,T};
 2857: handle_call(next_call, _From, call_within) ->
 2858:     {reply,ok,[]};
 2859: handle_call(next_call, _From, State) ->
 2860:     io:format("handle_call(next_call) -> State: ~p~n", [State]),
 2861:     {reply,false,State};
 2862: handle_call(badreturn, _From, _State) ->
 2863:     badreturn;
 2864: handle_call(hibernate, _From, _State) ->
 2865:     {reply,true,[],hibernate};
 2866: handle_call({hibernate_noreply,Pid}, From, _State) ->
 2867:     Pid ! go,
 2868:     {noreply,From,hibernate};
 2869: handle_call(stop, _From, State) ->
 2870:     {stop,stopped,ok,State};
 2871: handle_call(crash, _From, _State) ->
 2872:     exit(crashed);
 2873: handle_call(exit_shutdown, _From, _State) ->
 2874:     exit(shutdown);
 2875: handle_call(stop_shutdown, _From, State) ->
 2876:     {stop,shutdown,State};
 2877: handle_call(shutdown_reason, _From, _State) ->
 2878:     exit({shutdown,reason});
 2879: handle_call({call_undef_fun, Mod, Fun}, _From, State) ->
 2880:     Mod:Fun(),
 2881:     {reply, ok, State};
 2882: handle_call({continue_reply, Pid}, _From, State) ->
 2883:     self() ! {after_continue, Pid},
 2884:     {reply, ok, State, {continue, {message, Pid}}};
 2885: handle_call({continue_noreply, Pid}, From, State) ->
 2886:     self() ! {after_continue, Pid},
 2887:     {noreply, State, {continue, {message, Pid, From}}};
 2888: handle_call(stop_shutdown_reason, _From, State) ->
 2889:     {stop,{shutdown,stop_reason},State}.
 2890: 
 2891: handle_cast({From,handle_cast}, State) ->
 2892:     From ! {self(), handled_cast},
 2893:     {noreply, State};
 2894: handle_cast({From,delayed_cast,T}, _State) ->
 2895:     {noreply, {delayed_cast,From}, T};
 2896: handle_cast(hibernate_now, _State) ->
 2897:     {noreply, [], hibernate};
 2898: handle_cast(hibernate_later, _State) ->
 2899:     {ok, _} = timer:send_after(1000,self(),hibernate_now),
 2900:     {noreply, []};
 2901: handle_cast({call_undef_fun, Mod, Fun}, State) ->
 2902:     Mod:Fun(),
 2903:     {noreply, State};
 2904: handle_cast({continue_noreply, Pid}, State) ->
 2905:     self() ! {after_continue, Pid},
 2906:     {noreply, State, {continue, {message, Pid}}};
 2907: handle_cast({From, stop}, State) ->
 2908:     io:format("BAZ"),
 2909:     {stop, {From,stopped}, State}.
 2910: 
 2911: handle_info(timeout, {reply_to, From, State}) ->
 2912:     gen_server:reply(From, delayed),
 2913:     {noreply, State};
 2914: handle_info(timeout, hibernate_me) -> % Arrive here from 
 2915: 						% handle_info(hibernate_later,...)
 2916:     {noreply, [], hibernate};
 2917: handle_info(hibernate_now, _State) ->  % Arrive here from 
 2918: 						% handle_cast({_,hibernate_later},...)
 2919: 						% and by direct ! from testcase
 2920:     {noreply, [], hibernate};
 2921: handle_info(hibernate_later, _State) ->
 2922:     {noreply, hibernate_me, 1000};
 2923: handle_info(timeout, call_within) ->
 2924:     {noreply, []};
 2925: handle_info(timeout, {delayed_cast, From}) ->
 2926:     From ! {self(), delayed},
 2927:     {noreply, []};
 2928: handle_info(timeout, {delayed_info, From}) ->
 2929:     From ! {self(), delayed_info},
 2930:     {noreply, []};
 2931: handle_info({call_undef_fun, Mod, Fun}, State) ->
 2932:     Mod:Fun(),
 2933:     {noreply, State};
 2934: handle_info({From, handle_info}, _State) ->
 2935:     From ! {self(), handled_info},
 2936:     {noreply, []};
 2937: handle_info({From, delayed_info, T}, _State) ->
 2938:     {noreply, {delayed_info, From}, T};
 2939: handle_info(continue, From) ->
 2940:     gen_server:reply(From,true),
 2941:     {noreply, []};
 2942: handle_info({From, stop}, State) ->
 2943:     {stop, {From,stopped_info}, State};
 2944: handle_info({after_continue, Pid}, State) ->
 2945:     Pid ! {self(), after_continue},
 2946:     Pid ! {self(), ack},
 2947:     {noreply, State};
 2948: handle_info({continue_noreply, Pid}, State) ->
 2949:     self() ! {after_continue, Pid},
 2950:     {noreply, State, {continue, {message, Pid}}};
 2951: handle_info({continue_continue, Pid}, State) ->
 2952:     {noreply, State, {continue, {continue, Pid}}};
 2953: handle_info(continue_stop, State) ->
 2954:     {noreply, State, {continue, stop}};
 2955: handle_info(_Info, State) ->
 2956:     {noreply, State}.
 2957: 
 2958: handle_continue({continue, Pid}, State) ->
 2959:     Pid ! {self(), before_continue},
 2960:     self() ! {after_continue, Pid},
 2961:     {noreply, State, {continue, {message, Pid}}};
 2962: handle_continue(stop, State) ->
 2963:     {stop, normal, State};
 2964: handle_continue({message, Pid}, State) ->
 2965:     Pid ! {self(), continue},
 2966:     {noreply, State};
 2967: handle_continue({message, Pid, From}, State) ->
 2968:     Pid ! {self(), continue},
 2969:     gen_server:reply(From, ok),
 2970:     {noreply, State}.
 2971: 
 2972: code_change(_OldVsn,
 2973:             {new, {undef_in_code_change, {Mod, Fun}}} = State,
 2974:             _Extra) ->
 2975:     Mod:Fun(),
 2976:     {ok, State}.
 2977: 
 2978: terminate({From, stopped}, _State) ->
 2979:     io:format("FOOBAR"),
 2980:     From ! {self(), stopped},
 2981:     ok;
 2982: terminate({From, stopped_info}, _State) ->
 2983:     From ! {self(), stopped_info},
 2984:     ok;
 2985: terminate(_, crash_terminate) ->
 2986:     exit({crash, terminate});
 2987: terminate(_, {undef_in_terminate, {Mod, Fun}}) ->
 2988:     Mod:Fun(),
 2989:     ok;
 2990: terminate(_Reason, _State) ->
 2991:     ok.
 2992: 
 2993: format_status(_, [_PDict, Fun] = S) when is_function(Fun) ->
 2994:     Fun(S);
 2995: format_status(terminate, [_PDict, State]) ->
 2996:     {formatted, State};
 2997: format_status(normal, [_PDict, _State]) ->
 2998:     format_status_called.
 2999: 
 3000: %% Utils...
 3001: 
 3002: wait_until(Fun) ->
 3003:     case catch Fun() of
 3004:         true ->
 3005:             ok;
 3006:         _ ->
 3007:             receive after 100 -> ok end,
 3008:             wait_until(Fun)
 3009:     end.
 3010: 
 3011: old_release(N) ->
 3012:     OldRel = integer_to_list(list_to_integer(erlang:system_info(otp_release))-N),
 3013:     {OldRel++"_latest", OldRel}.
 3014: 
 3015: flush_msgq() ->
 3016:     flush_msgq(0).
 3017: flush_msgq(N) ->
 3018:     receive
 3019: 	_ ->
 3020: 	    flush_msgq(N+1)
 3021:     after 0 ->
 3022: 	    N
 3023:     end.
